1.content:
Brandon and James were at their usual afterschool hangout in the woods just relaxing and talking about what a living nightmare their high school is with the strict teachers, jerkoff jocks, and snotty cheerleaders to the brooding goth kids and just about everything in between.

"Man, there are so many jerks and wierdos in school. It's hard to take" said Brandon in exasperation.

"I just wish there was a way that we could change all that." James says to which Brandon nods his head in agreement.

Suddenly the boys notice something glinting on the ground and Brandon picks it up. "Looks like some sort of coin." he says as he looks it over from front to back. On the front it says "Magic Wishing Coin" and on the back has a bunch of print that is so small that they would be unable to read it without a magnifying glass. "Yeah right." he says sarcastically about what the coin says it is.

James however wants to try it out just for kicks. "Come on man, what harm would it do?" he asks.

Brandon thinks about it for a moment and decides to try it out. "Ok, I wish that tree trunk over there was red." he says. Just then, his and James' eyes widen. They watch as the tree trunk slowly starts shifting from it's usual brown to red. "Wow, it does work." he says out loud.

What do the boys decide to do now?
1.title: In the Woods

choices: Use It On Each Other At School
11.content:
"How about we have some fun using it on each other?" Brandon suggests.

James nods his head in agreement. "So who goes first?" he asks.
11.title: Use it on Each Other

choices: Brandon Will Become His Biggest Idol
111.content:
"I think I'll use it on you first." James says before heading off towards another part of the woods to make a wish.

Brandon is confused by this. "Why are you going over there?" he asks.

James turns back around, "I want to make the wish I want to make a surprise for you." he says as he goes further into the thicket.

Brandon then nods his head. "Ah I gotcha, that's pretty cool." he replies.

When James is out of Brandon's earshot, he begins making his wish. "I wish that..."
111.title: James Uses it on Brandon

1111.content:
"I wish that Brandon would become his idol." James says and when he feels the coin grow warm, he takes that as an indicator that the wish has been granted.

With the wish granted, he goes back to Brandon with a grin on his face. "So Brandon how do you feel?" he asks.

Brandon looks at James and then looks himself over. "I feel normal why?" he asks.

James is a little frustrated. "Damn it I guess it didn't work, must've been my imagination." he says as he slips the coin in his pocket.

Brandon just shrugs his shoulders and they both head back towards their respective homes.
1111.title: Brandon Will Become His Biggest Idol

11111.content:
Brandon's home was reached first. "Well I guess we had fun today, I'll see you tomorrow at school." he says as he heads inside his house.

"Ok see you tomorrow." James replies as he begins heading towards his own home. "It almost sounded like Brandon's voice was a little higher...nah just my imagination." he says as he finally reaches his home.

"Mom, dad I'm home." Brandon announces once he gets inside.
11111.title: Brandon's House

111112.content:
When Brandon doesn't get any answers from his parents, that can only mean one thing to him and that's they're not home. "Cool now I can have all sorts of fun." Brandon says to himself as he sits down at the couch and turns on the TV.

He starts searching for a program to watch and while he's searching, his body starts to get smaller in stature as well as losing weight making him a very nice 105 lbs.

Finally he stops on a comedy program and decides to watch that. At first the show makes him laugh uncontrollably until it eventually gets to a point where it's not funny anymore. "This really lost it's luster." he says to himself.

Brandon picks up the remote and begins going through the channels until he finds something that he knows he would enjoy watching. "Ah this looks like it could be good." he says as he stops on this show.
111112.title: They're Gone

1111121.content:
"It's weird that I've never been interested in watching something like this before but for some reason it looks really interesting." he says as he watches the fashion show.

As he watches the show, he starts to have memories of actually sitting out in the crowd watching these shows live and even participating in them, strutting his stuff down the catwalk. He quickly shakes his head. "What's up with that?" he asks himself.

However, he starts to feel a bit lonely and wonders if James is available to come over and he picks up the phone and calls him. While the phone is ringing, his body changes some more with his skin becoming silky smooth as well as devoid of bodyhair.

A few more rings later the phone is picked up and Brandon responds. "Hi is James there? I'd like to speak to him." Brandon requests.
1111121.title: Fashion Show

11111211.content:
It was James' mom who answered. "Oh hey Brandon, yea he's here just up in his room, let me go call him for you." she says as she sets the phone down to go get him.

While Brandon's waiting for James to pick up the phone, he feels an itch at his scalp and reaches up to give it a scratch. "That felt kinda weird." he mutters to himself. What bothered him was that his hair felt longer and it was, down to his ears and had begun to darken.

After a few seconds the phone is picked back up. "Hello?" James asks as he picks it up.

Brandon smiles when he hears James' voice. "Hey James I was wondering if you'd like to come over and watch some TV with me?" he asks. What does James respond with?
11111211.title: He's Home

111112111.content:
"Hold on a minute Brandon while I go ask my mom." James says as he gets up from the phone and goes towards his mom. "Hey mom can I go over to Brandon's?" he asks.

His mom thinks about it for moment before answering. "Sure I guess you could, just make sure you're back before nine." she says.

"Thanks mom." James replies before picking the phone back up. "My mom says I can come over so I'll be there in a little bit." he says before hanging up and heading out of the house.

Brandon is excited to hear that news and hangs up the phone before going back to watching his program. While he watches, his skin starts to take on a darker tone as his ethnicity changes, making him half-Armenian.
111112111.title: Sure

1111121111.content:
Brandon continues watching his show with a growing interest when suddenly there's a knock on the door. "Oh I bet that's James." he says to himself with a smile as he gets up to go open the door.

Sure enough, James is on the other end of the door. "Hey Brandon, so you wanted to hang out?" he asks as he steps inside the house.

Brandon smiles as he leads him over to the couch. "Yep I was wondering if you wanted to watch this show with me." he says as he sits down next to James.

James looks at the TV and is confused since he knows that neither him nor Brandon enjoy fashion shows. "Brandon why are you watching this?" he asks.
1111121111.title: James Arrives

11111211111.content:
When James turned towards Brandon to ask him the question, it's then he notices the changes that have happened to his friend since the last time they saw each other. "Brandon what's up with you? You look a little odd." he says.

Brandon glances over his shoulder at a mirror that's on the wall and looks at his reflection. "What are you talking about James? I've always looked like this." he says as he goes back to watching the fashion show.

James is a little confused at the moment and fingers the coin in his pocket. 'Maybe I should hold on to this for awhile.' he thinks to himself.

As Brandon and James continue watching the show, James feels something odd in the air and looks over at Brandon and watches as it looks like Brandon's shirt starts to turn a purple color. "Brandon your shirt." he says as he points at the shirt.

Brandon then looks down at his shirt.
11111211111.title: He Notices the Changes

111112111111.content:
Brandon continues to stare at his shirt and then turns to look at James with a confused expression on his face. "I don't know what you're talking about James, my shirt has always looked like this." he replies.

James is now convinced that his wish had indeed come true as that's the only explanation for what's happening to Brandon now and reaches into his pocket to pull out the coin. "I wish to know who Brandon's biggest idol is." he says quietly to himself.

The coin gets warm in his hand and James' eyes widen as the information is given to him. "Oh my God I gotta do something about this." he says as he turns back towards Brandon who's staring at him.

Brandon looks even more different as his arms are much slimmer than before as well as delicate and feminine. "Hey James what's that?" he asks as he reaches towards him.
111112111111.title: It Looks Normal

1111121111111.content:
James wasn't quick enough as Brandon was fast enough to reach over and grab the coin from James. "Oh yea that funny coin. I wonder if I could make a wish on it now." he says as his voice gets a little higher pitched.

James had every right in the world to be afraid of what could happen if Brandon made a wish in his altered state. "Hey Brandon I think you should probably give it back for now." he says, pleading with him.

Brandon shakes his head at James. "Sorry James but it's my turn to make a wish on it." he says while thinking. "Since you seem to be determined to get it, I wish that until I make one more wish, you can't touch it." he says.

Brandon feels the coin get warm in his hand. "Hmm...I guess that means my wish has been granted." he replies as he slides the coin into his pocket and continues watching tv.
1111121111111.title: Brandon Gets It

11111211111111.content:
All James can do is sit back and hope that the wish that Brandon's bound to make won't be something that will end up screwing the both of them. "Please don't let him make a wish that'll make things hard to fix this mess." he says quietly to himself.

It's not much longer after that when the show finally ends. "Ah damn that was a good show too." Brandon says pouting and looking at the tv to see what's on next.

Brandon starts to flip through the channels and James catches a glimpse of his friend's hands and watches them slim out with longer fingers and even longer fingernails. "I gotta stop this soon." he says quietly.

Brandon doesn't find anything good on the tv and his age jumps up to 20. "I got an idea, how about we go out somewhere?" he asks.
11111211111111.title: Continuing

111112111111111.content:
James looks at Brandon and nods his head. "Sure, I'd love to get out of here and go someplace else." James replies as just sitting here is starting to freak him out and gives him less chances of getting the coin from Brandon.

"Perfect." says an excited Brandon as he goes over to the side table in the living room and picks up his wallet which looked at little bigger than normal. He pulls out a pair of keys from it as they both leave the house.

Once outside, they head towards what James recognizes as Brandon's car but it looks a little different. "Hey man your car looks a little different." he says as he looks it over.

Brandon has that same confused look on his face as he turns back to James. "What's different about it?" he asks.
111112111111111.title: Sure

1111121111111111.content:
James points towards the passenger side fender. "That dent that was there when you got hit by that one guy is gone." he says.

Brandon goes over towards the car and looks at where he's pointed at. "I never got hit there by anyone. I always make sure not to have any issues with my car since I paid a lot of money for it." he says as he gets in the passenger side.

James just shrugs his shoulders and gets into the passenger side. Before he can ask where they're going he sees the latest change to Brandon which is that his shirt has turned completely purple.

James was thinking about letting him know that but he's brushed off every change he's mentioned so far.
1111121111111111.title: Dent is Fixed

11111211111111112.content:
James decides anyway to try and point out the difference in Brandon's clothes in hope that maybe this will be the one that gets him to pay attention. "Brandon your shirt is completely purple." he says as he points at it.

Brandon gives him another confused look. "Yea what about it James? I've been wearing this shirt all day." he replies as he pulls the car out of his driveway.

Sighing to himself, James just decides to wait it out until an opportunity to get the coin back presents itself. "Just gotta bide my time." he mutters to himself.

As they drive, Brandon reaches down and turns on the radio and what comes out is a shock to James. "Since when did you listen to Katy Perry?" he asks in a confused tone. What is Brandon's answer?
11111211111111112.title: Point It Out Anyway

111112111111111121.content:
Brandon is getting even more concerned and confused with James' statements by the minute. "I've been listening to her since she came out. I think she's a very talented performer." he replies as he continues driving.

James can't believe what he's hearing since Brandon had always hated all those pop artists, preferring to listen to alternative rock and things you don't normally hear on the mainstream music scene.

As Brandon continues to drive, James sees a sparkle coming from Brandon's face and notices that Brandon is now wearing a pair of dangly earrings. 'I'm not gonna even bother pointing them out this time.' he thinks to himself.

After spending a few more minutes of driving, they finally reach their destination. "Ok here we are." Brandon says as he shuts off the car.
111112111111111121.title: Years

1111121111111111211.content:
James steps out of the car and stands next to Brandon and his eyes widen upon seeing where Brandon decided to take them. "Oh come on." he mutters in frustration.

Brandon turns around and gives him a glare. "You know, I'm starting to get a little sick of your negative attitude you've been having all night. I'm going to go in and you can join me when you decide to be in a better mood." Brandon replies as he heads inside.

James just stands there and looks at the ground having his morale lowered after Brandon said those things to him. If he would've taken the time to look up, he would've seen Brandon changing further as his height got smaller, going down to 5'2".
1111121111111111211.title: Clothing Store

11111211111111112111.content:
Brandon is still pretty steamed at James' behavior. "Maybe a little wish will make things better." he says as he pulls the coin out of his wallet which is even larger than before and starting to turn a purple to match his shirt.

Taking a breath, Brandon holds the coin and makes his wish. "I wish that James would be more like me." he says before depositing the coin back in his wallet after feeling it get warm, granting his wish.

He starts going through the clothing seeing if there's anything he would like. 'And I'll hold onto it a bit longer and not let him know I made that wish for safety reasons.' he thinks to himself.
11111211111111112111.title: With Brandon

111112111111111121111.content:
James continues to stand outside next to Brandon's car when he realizes something. 'Maybe Brandon is doing something with the coin.' he thinks to himself as he rushes inside.

Once he's inside, he starts looking for Brandon and notices that Brandon is just looking through some clothes. "Oh good, he's just going through clothes." he says to himself, not noticing how his voice is a little higher.

He walks over to Brandon and his friend looks up at him. "Oh hey James are you feeling like you're in a better mood?" he asks as James approaches him.

James does feel a little bit better but does he let Brandon in on it?
111112111111111121111.title: Back With James

1111121111111111211111.content:
James looks up at his friend and gives him a small smile. "Actually yea I am, I guess I just needed a little bit of fresh air." James says, making up an reason while still trying to get the coin although he had to wait for Brandon to make a wish, not knowing that it had already happened.

Brandon then picks up a green dress. "This looks nice, I'm gonna go try it on." he says as he heads towards the dressing room as his hair grows down to his chin and is even darker now.

James is about to protest Brandon's choice of clothing when he's distracted by something else. As he goes over towards it his skin begins to darken, making him half-Armenian just like Brandon.

What is it that James found that distracted him?
1111121111111111211111.title: Yes

11111211111111112111112.content:
James looks over towards the clothes racks and starts walking towards it to find a a nice black miniskirt. "I bet this would look nice on me." he says to himself as he shakes his head. 'What am I saying?' he thinks to himself.

Meanwhile, Brandon had put on the green dress and was admiring himself in the mirror. "This dress really brings out my figure." he says to himself while blowing his reflection a kiss. While he did that, his fignernails turned a bright red color.

James looked over the skirt for a little bit longer as he was struck with a strange urge to try it on. "Well I guess I'll just get it on to get rid of this urge." he says to himself as his voice goes up a little bit.

James then heads towards the dressing room with the skirt in his hands. But is Brandon done yet?
11111211111111112111112.title: Something

111112111111111121111121.content:
Before James even began heading towards the dressing room, Brandon had already changed into his regular clothes and was ready to leave the room and pay for the dress.

As Brandon left the dressing room, his regular clothes began changing some more. His shirt was completely purple and that color was beginning to leak into his shorts.

On the way out he bumped into James. "Oh hey James, you find something you like?" he asks as he eyes the skirt that James is carrying.

James looks down at the skirt and smiles at Brandon as his hair gets a little longer to the same length as Brandon's darkening to the same color. "Yea I'm gonna go try this on." James says as he goes past Brandon into the changing room.

Brandon then nods at him as he heads towards the checkout counter.
111112111111111121111121.title: Yes

1111121111111111211111211.content:
Brandon is all smiles as he takes the dress up to the front counter to pay for it, thinking about how many heads he's going to turn when he wears it out in public. "The guys will be drooling over it." he says to himself.

When Brandon goes to pay for it, the cashier is immediately starstruck. "Oh my gosh, Mr. Kardashian it's an honor to have you shopping here. Did you find everything ok?" she asks as she rings him up.

Brandon is confused by her statement but then shakes his head as he remembers that his name is indeed Brandon Kardashian and the person he's replacing fades from existence.

But what of James?
1111121111111111211111211.title: With Brandon

11111211111111112111112111.content:
James is still in the dressing room looking at the skirt, still not believing that he's actually going to put it on. "I have to do this to get that urge." he says to himself as he takes his jeans off.

As he removed his jeans, he didn't notice that his pants were beginning to darken and change material, becoming softer. He then slides the skirt on. "Hmm doesn't look too bad actually." he says to himself.

After a moment of staring at himself, he decides that he wants to buy it. "I don't know why but I really want to buy this." he says to himself as he slides his jeans back on.

On the way out, he has to take his wallet out as it was straining against his pocket. When he took it out, the back pocket vanished.
11111211111111112111112111.title: Still Trying On Skirt

111112111111111121111121111.content:
Brandon was still standing at the front counter while he waited for James to return. By now he had been talking with the cashier about various things. While this was going on, Brandon's pants were now completely purple like his shirt.

He looked over towards the changing rooms and smiled when he saw James approaching. "Took him long enough." he mutters which makes the cashier giggle.

James then places the skirt on the counter to pay for it. "So I guess you really liked it huh?" Brandon says to which James nods to, confirming that statement.

As James pays for his new skirt, his skin becomes silky smooth and devoid of any hair, giving it the same qualities that Brandon's had.
111112111111111121111121111.title: Paying

1111121111111111211111211111.content:
Since both of them had something to take back from the store, the decided to leave and head somewhere else to spend their time before going back to the place they needed to be which they still didn't know where that was.

They got back into Brandon's car which now was a very expensive black Bently which makes James' eyes widen. "When did you get this thing?" he says with surprise.

Brandon just sighs. "It was a birthday present James don't you remember?" he asks as his voice shifts to that of a fully adult woman's. "Nevermind just get in." he says as he gets into the driver side and sets his wallet underneath his seat.

James then gets in the passenger side while his pants turn completely black while that color starts to leak into his white t-shirt.
1111121111111111211111211111.title: Leaving

11111211111111112111112111111.content:
The two of them drive off with Katy Perry still blasting through Brandon's speakers. James then finds himself enjoying the music even more. "You know, this really isn't that bad." he says which causes Brandon to smile.

Once they reach a red light, Brandon pulls down the visor and fixes his hair in the mirror which is now past his shoulders and completely black. "My hair can cause such a fuss sometimes." he says to himself before closing it back up.

James too was having trouble with his hair as it was past his shoulders as well and turned the same shade of black. "Maybe we should head somewhere they can get it taken care of." he suggests.

Brandon's ears then perk up at this.
11111211111111112111112111111.title: Driving

111112111111111121111121111111.content:
The light is still red when Brandon looks over at James and gives him a smile. "You know, that's not a bad idea. I know of a great salon that's just a few blocks away from here." he says when the light finally turns green and he continues driving.

James also thinks this is a good idea but quickly shakes his head. "What are you talking about? We need to go to a barber." he suggests as his voice is now that of an adult females.

Brandon laughs at that suggestion. "Oh come on James, that place only wants to lob it off. I want to get mine styled." he says as he sees the salon up ahead and parks the car.

Brandon then reaches down to where his wallet was where there's now a wide purple clutch purse. "Come on let's go." he says as he gets out of the car to head inside.
111112111111111121111121111111.title: Sure

1111121111111111211111211111111.content:
James thinks about it for a moment and decides that it probably wouldn't be a good idea to leave Brandon alone. Of course if he did that before, he wouldn't be turning into Brandon's new older sister which was becoming even more evident as his identity began to alter, making him James Kardashian while the person he was replacing faded from existence as well.

They both stand next to each other as they approach the receptionists desk. "Excuse me ma'am, my friend and I were wondering if you had any openings available for us." Brandon says sweetly as his legs begin to fill out, becoming toned and womanly.

The woman looks up at both Brandon and James and her eyes widen. "Oh for you two?" Absolutly please come with me." she says as she waves for them to follow her.
1111121111111111211111211111111.title: James Follows

11111211111111112111112111111111.content:
The receptionist then leads them towards a spot in the salon where there are two empty places. "Here you go sirs, please take a seat and one of our stylists will be with you shortly." she says before heading back to the front desk.

Brandon and James both sit next to each other as a pair of stylists then come by to work on them. "Good afternoon sirs it's an honor to be working with you today. Just sit back and relax and we'll get you looking great." they tell the boys.

As the stylists work on their hair, James arms and hands become thin and feminine to catch up to Brandon's as well as his legs filling out with womanly tone and shape.

And it wasn't long after that the sylists were finished. "Ok now what do you think of this?" they ask as they show them their new dues.
11111211111111112111112111111111.title: Being Seated

111112111111111121111121111111111.content:
Both Brandon and James mouths spread into wide grins upon seeing their new hairstyles. Brandon has a long wavy style while James' begins to curl a bit once the hair is on his chin level.

"Wow my hair looks absolutly gorgeous, you girls were magnificent." Brandon says as he primps himself in the mirror and even blows himself another kiss like he did back in the dressing room. He feels a bit of indigestion as his waist starts to pull in.

James has the same reaction to his own new hairstyle and even finds himself primping himself. 'Just what the hell is going on with me?' he thinks to himself and wonders if the wish is effecting him. His own waist begins pulling in on itself.
111112111111111121111121111111111.title: They Love it

1111121111111111211111211111111112.content:
The stylists then begin looking over the boys' faces. "Don't take this the wrong way but we were wondering if we could work on your faces too?" they ask them.

The boys think about it for a moment as both of their ages jump up higher, reaching twenty-five years old. After giving themselves another glance in the mirror, they look at them and nod their heads. "Sure let's take it further." they reply.

The stylists give each other a high-five as the excitement of working on the Kardashian brothers is something that they'll remember for the rest of their lives. "Don't you fellas worry about a thing, we'll have you looking gorgeous in no time." they say as they begin working.
1111121111111111211111211111111112.title: Continue On

11111211111111112111112111111111121.content:
The stylists then start by placing masks on the faces of Brandon and James to smooth out their skin which in actuallity was already pretty smooth but this would take it to another level.

While they were under the the stylists were working on their hands, giving them manicures and then going over their nails, painting them a bright red color.

And then finally it was time for the stylists to remove the masks. "Ok are you two ready to see how you look?" they ask and both of the Kardashian brothers nod their heads.
11111211111111112111112111111111121.title: Getting to Work

111112111111111121111121111111111211.content:
The stylists then remove the masks on their faces before turning their chairs around to face the mirrors. "So what do you guys think?" they ask.

Both Brandon and James' eyes go completely wide. The masks had completely alter their faces. They now had fuller lips, higher cheekbones, large, round eyes surrounded by long thick lashes.

Brandon was completely under the spell of the wish while James was easily able to recognize the faces. "He looks like Kim and I look like Kourtney." he says to himself quietly.

The stylists are gushing over how nice the two brothers look, they then help them out of the chairs and take them towards the front counter to pay.
111112111111111121111121111111111211.title: Removing

1111121111111111211111211111111112111.content:
Once they are done, they are lead to the front counter so they can pay for their makeovers. Brandon reaches into his purse to pay for his own while James looks down at his wallet and his eyes widen.

Instead of the wallet he was used to carrying, he now had an expensive black leather purse with one large strap so he could carry it over his shoulder. Almost as if in a trance, he reaches in to grab a credit card to pay for his makeover.

With their sessions paid for, they then return to Brandon's Bently and get in to go to their next destination. "So where should we go now?" Brandon asks.
1111121111111111211111211111111112111.title: Paying and Leaving

11111211111111112111112111111111121111.content:
James is about to answer when his stomach rumbling does that for him. "I guess that we could get something to eat." he says to which Brandon nods in response.

"Alrighty, I know of a really nice bistro which is not far from here." he says as he makes a sharp right turn to take them there. As he was driving his pants and shirt merged together to form one garment while James' clothes turned completely black.

It wasn't long after that they arrived at the bistro where there were many people outside waiting to get in. "Looks like we're gonna have a tough time getting a table." James says.

Brandon just turns around and smiles at him. "We just need to work our magic." he says as he leads the way in.
11111211111111112111112111111111121111.title: Dinner

111112111111111121111121111111111211111.content:
As they approach the doors, Brandon begins to strut like a runway model, his hips swinging back and forth seductively which certainly grabbed the attention of James. 'This has got to stop soon.' he thinks to himself.

They finally reach the doors and go inside before making their way to the front counter. "Excuse me sir, I was wondering if me and my brother here could get a table please?" he asks.

The maitre'd immediately recognizes Brandon's face. "Of course, we always have an opening for someone of your stature. Please follow me." the waiter says as he grabs two menus and motions for Brandon and James to follow him.

As the two of them followed, James' pants finished their change into a black leather skirt while the leggings of Brandon's pants merged together to form a dress.

They then reached a private area of the restaurant.
111112111111111121111121111111111211111.title: Working His Magic

1111121111111111211111211111111112111111.content:
Once they were in the back, they were then seated at a table and handed their menus. "Alrighty do you two need to look through or do you know what you'd like to start off with for drinks?" the waiter asks.

They both look through the menus before turning towards the waiter. "I think I'd like to have a glass of your finest wine please." Brandon says as his age finishes out at thirty.

James is wondering what all he can order but when he hears Brandon ordering an alcoholic beverage, he figures that's probably the best choice for him as well. "I'd like one of those too." he says as his age also gets higher, stopping at 32.

The waiter writes these down. "Sounds good, I will get these out to you as soon as I can." he says as he leaves.
1111121111111111211111211111111112111111.title: Inside

1111121111111111211111211111111112111111.content:
Brandon and James don't have much time to make conversation before the waiter arrives with their wine. "Wow that was really fast." Brandon remarks as he takes a sip. "And this is delicious as well."

The waiter then bows before him. "Always the best services for our best customers." he says before pulling his pad back out. "So are you two ready to order or do you need more time?" he asks, eager to continue serving them.

They both continue looking over their menus while their clothes continue changing. For Brandon, the sleeves of his dress extend to his elbows while the entire garment becomes figure hugging. In James' case, his black shirt splits down the middle before buttoning itself up and becoming a thicker material as it becomes a sweater.

They then look up and are ready to order.
1111121111111111211111211111111112111111.title: Drinks Arrive

1111121111111111211111211111111112111111.content:
Brandon orders first. "I'd like to have your shrimp platter with a side of grab legs please." he says as he hands the menu back to the waiter who then turns his attention to James.

"And for you sir?" he asks, awaiting James to make his order.

James thinks about it for a moment. "I think I'd just like a pasta please." he replies and then hands his menu over to the waiter who then writes both of their orders down.

Brandon laughed back "No, this is only the beginning, after we get Derek we'll move on to someone else, and by the time we're done we'll rule the entire school!"

When they were done changing, they assembled with the other boys. Usually, they would wait for their PE assignment, but this time they would be in control. Mr. Hanson walked in front of the class and began to make the usual announcement.

The four of them continue walking through the hallway, talking about how cool it was that Dave would no longer be there to give them a rough time when they hear the one minute warning bell which means they have to seperate and go to their next classes.

Before they split though, Lucy comes up with an idea. "Like, hey James how about like, letting me borrow that wishing thing for awhile?" she asks as she bats her eyelashes, trying to come off really flirty.

Does it work on James?
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Continue

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
As much as James knew this was going to be a bad idea, he fell to his girlfriend's charms and handed over the coin to her. "Just please promise me you'll be responsible with it." he pleads.

Lucy just giggles as she quickly swipes the coin away from James. "Oh I promise." she says as she giggles again before heading off with Kandi to the next class those two share together.

Brandon and James watch as the two girls walk away, chit-chatting about who knows what when Brandon stepped forward and spoke up. "I got a bad feeling about this. I think you may have made a pretty bad decision there." he says in a serious tone.

James just shrugs it off as nothing. "They're just a couple of dumb girls, what kind of trouble could they get into?" James says as the two of them head off towards their own class.

However, little did they know that with Lucy holding the stone, a lot of trouble was going to happen.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Yes

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
As Lucy and Kandi start heading towards their class, Kandi can't help but giggle at how Lucy put one over on James. "Wow Lucy, it was like you had him under your control. Men are so easy to manipulate. Just a wink or a bat of the eyelashes and you have them eating out of the palm of your hand." she says.

Lucy just nods her head and giggles. "Yea, like totally. My James just can't like, say no to anything I ask him." she says before giggling again.

Lucy looks at the coin as she thinks about all the fun she could have with it. And with her brain almost like cotton candy filled with thoughts of rainbows and unicorns, the possibilities were endless of what she could do. "I could make James into the perfect boyfriend. Or maybe Brandon into the perfect man for you." she suggests.

However Kandi stops walking and grips Lucy's shoulder. "I've got an even better idea that will be a ton of fun to do." she says.

With the determination in Kandi's voice, Lucy can't help but want to hear what she has to suggest. "So like, what's this super cool idea?" she asks.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Follow the Girls

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Kandi's grin goes from ear to ear as her eyes are almost as wide as the ocean. "How about we turn the boys into girls like us so that we can all go out man hunting." she suggests.

The wheels inside Lucy's head start turning and her own eyes brighten as a smile breaks out on her pink pouty lips. "That like, sounds like a perfect idea. Who needs boyfriends when you can like, have even cooler girlfriends." she says excitedly.

Kandi knows that things are about to get a lot more interesting when another idea comes to her. "Hey Lucy before you make that wish, how about we make it even more fun as it happens?" she asks.

Lucy's eyes get even brighter if that were possible. "What like other super fun thing were you thinking of Kandi?" she asks, wanting to know more.

Kandi's smile turns even more mischievious. "How about we turn one of them slowly one at a time and watch the other one react?" she suggests.

Lucy is full on nodding her head, causing her blonde hair to shake wildly. "Sounds super cool. So like, which one should be changed first?"
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Make the Boys Into Girls

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Kandi thinks about it for a moment and makes her decision. "How about changing Brandon first? That way it would really let James know he just made a huge mistake." she suggests.

Upon hearing this Lucy just gives a quick nod. "Sounds super awesome to me." she says as she holds the coin and looks at it. "I wish that Brandon would slowly start turning into a girl like us and halfway through his change, James would start changing into a girl with him." she says.

Kandi smiles and pats Lucy on the back. "Nicely done, now we just wait until this last class of the day and we'll all meet up and have some real fun." she says.

As they walk towards their last class, Lucy suddenly remembers something. "Hey like, don't they have some protection against the coin being used against them or something?" she asks.

Kandi just shakes her head. "That's only for use out of malice, this is for fun and trust me, it's going to be a lot of fun." she says as both girls head towards their last class.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Brandon

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
As Brandon and James were walking down the hall towards their next class, Brandon felt a strange rumbling in his abdomen. "Gotta take a quick pitstop." he says as he starts to head towards the bathroom.

James starts following him. "Dude if you go you're gonna be late and if you get another tardy from Ms. Keller, it's gonna mean detention." he says trying to get Brandon to reconsider.

Brandon just shrugs his shoulders. "I'm not all that worried about it really." he says. When he spoke however, his voice seemed to go up an octave, something that James didn't miss.

"You ok Brandon? You sound a little funny." he says with some concern in his voice.

Brandon is starting to get a little irritated. "I'm fine man enough with the questions, will you just let me go to the bathroom?" he asks as he starts to go to the restrooms.

But when he gets there, he has a little bit of confusion as to which one to go to and he tries to decide.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Back to the Boys

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Brandon glances up at the sign for the girls' restroom and shakes his head before heading into the boys room. 'Just what the hell was I thinking there?' he asks himself as he heads into the boys room.

James was wondering the exact same thing. "Why did it look like he was having trouble trying to figure out which restroom to go into?" he asks himself before deciding to follow him in and hope to ask him about it.

However the first thing he notices is that he can't see Brandon anywhere but then sees a pair of shoes underneath the stall wall, shoes he recognized as Brandon's. "What's he doing in a stall?" he asks.

The sound of a toilet flushes and Brandon steps out of the stall. "Oh hey James, did you need to use the restroom too?" he asks.

James is shocked at the latest change to Brandon. His hair has gotten longer, down to his chin and brightened to lighter color.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Boys

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
James though won't let this issue go. "Dude what's up with your hair? It's longer and lighter." he says as he points to Brandon's altered locks.

Brandon grips a few strands in his hand and looks at them. "Of course it's like this, I've had it this way for a few weeks now. Why are you pointing it out just now?" he asks.

James is now convinced that the coin has something to do with this. "I knew I shouldn't have given that coin to Lucy. But I was powerless to resist her feminine charms." he says, cursing himself.

He was so busy blaming himself for the mistake he made that he didn't notice Brandon leaving him alone in the restroom. He quickly collected his bearings and headed after his friend.

As he followed Brandon down the hall, he witnessed something else that was different that made him stare transfixed upon it. Brandon was now walking like a girl, putting one foot in front of the other causing his hips to sway back and forth with each step he took. He didn't have any hips to sway but James knew it wouldn't be too long before he did and he had to do something to stop it.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Going to Class

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
As James was having his dilema with Brandon, the girls were in their class on the other side of the school when an idea popped into Kandi's head. "You know what I just thought of, James will immediately think that we're responsible so we gotta throw him off our trail." she says.

Lucy looks up from her paper and glances over at Kandi. "You know, you're like totally right about that. But how are we going to do that?" she responds.

"Simple, just tell them that we lost it and someone else is responsible for the change. In fact how about you wish that James buys our explanation." she says.

Lucy nods her head. "That's like, a super awesome idea." she says as she pulls the coin from her purse. "I wish that like when James says anything about the coin, he'll like believe what we tell him." she says as the coin grows warm. "I guess it like, worked." she says as she places it back in her purse.

Do we stay with the girls or go back to the boys?
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Back to the Girls

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Back with James and Brandon, they went to their next class and James was shocked to see that Brandon didn't sit by him anymore. He now sat in the back of the class along with some of the ditzy girls. "Why is he with them?" he asks, not making the connection just yet.

All he can do is take his seat and wait for class to begin. Luckily, today's assignment was just reading through the chapter of the textbook so occasionally he would glance back and get a look at Brandon, but so far nothing about him had changed since last time.

Towards the end of class, he heard some giggling coming from the back and looked over his shoulder and was shocked at what he saw.

Brandon was now interacting with the girls, them treating him like he was one of their friends. But even more frightening for him was that Brandon had now changed further, his body frame much more delicate and feminine.

Finally the bell rings to end the school day and he waits for Brandon to walk by so he can talk to him.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: The Boys

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Just as Brandon is walking by James' desk, James grabs a hold of Brandon's arm and is a little shocked to feel just how smooth it is and how it's devoid of any signs of hair. "Dude, why are you hanging out with them?" he asks.

Brandon looks over at his new friends who are at the classroom door waiting for him before turning his attention back towards James. "They're my friends of course, just like you are." he replies.

As James tries to process this, he looks over at those girls who seem to be waving and smiling at him and he can't help but smile back, although very nervously. "So where are you planning on going?" he asks.

Brandon giggles at the question. "We're going to hang out with our other friends Lucy and Kandi, would you like to come with us?" he asks.

James thinks about it for a second and decides on wether or not that would be a good idea or if he'd be putting himself at risk as well.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Confrontation

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
After some weighing his options, James decided it would be best if he came along since this would be the only way he'd get a chance at getting the coin back. 'I bet she'll give it to me in a heartbeat considering how ditzy she is.' he thinks to himself as he gets up from his desk to follow Brandon.

He feels very uncomfortable around Brandon's new company but for some reason they seem to not think anything of having him along with them. 'Maybe it's because they know Brandon's my friend and they've hung around me before.' he rationalizes.

As they head through the hallways, James tries to keep a lookout for Lucy and hopes to get to her and get her to give him back the coin so he can undo whatever it was that she did. As he was doing so, Brandon and the girls, Stacy, Heather, and Michelle, got ahead of him.

And that's when he noticed something odd about Brandon's back pocket as it looked like his wallet was bulging out of it. Brandon noticed the discomfort and reached back to pull it out and James watched as both of Brandon's back pockets vanished. If he could've seen the front, those pockets up there would've gone away as well.

When he saw Brandon's wallet, he could've swore it looked bigger and more expensive looking.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Yes

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
They continue walking through the hallway when Brandon and the girls suddenly stop and each start waving a hand in the air. "Lucy over here." Heather calls out.

James looks up and tries to see where they're waving at and is able to catch Lucy coming through the hall with Kandi in tow, her cheerleader skirt flipping up and down as she hurries over to her friends. "Hey girls, like what's going on?" she asks.

James immdiately steps forward to talk to her and she looks at him with a smile on her face. "Oh hey babe, like, how's it going?" she asks.

James however, is in no mood to play any games. "Lucy can I talk with you for a minute?" he asks before looking at the girls. "Alone please." he says as he leads Lucy to a more secluded area.

As he walks away, he glances over his shoulder to see that Brandon had changed further, his height having shrunk from it's normal 5' 6" to a more petite 5' even.

Once he gets to a place where no one can hear him, Lucy talks first. "So what's up hun?" she asks sweetly.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Finding Lucy

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Not wasting any time, James gets right down to business. "You remember the coin right Lucy? Well I'd like to have it back please baby." he says, trying to sweet talk her into giving it to him.

Lucy nods her head. "Sure thing hon." she replies as she starts digging through her purse to find it. It actually is inside of there but after what Kandi told her, she knows she has to make up a fib.

As she keeps going through her purse, she puts a worried look on her face as she turns her head up to face James with a look of horror on her face. "I think I might've like, used it to buy a snack." she says as she pouts her lips.

James' eyes get wide when she reveals this to him. If this were any normal circumstance, he would've said she was lying but thanks to the previous wish she made, he completely believes her. "Lucy how could you be so careless?" he asks as he is about to lose it.

However what makes him suddenly calm down was that when he spoke, his voice seemed a little bit higher. 'Damn, whatever wish is effecting Brandon must be starting on me. Gotta find that coin.' he thinks to himself.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Ask About the Coin

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Before he can ask Lucy where she bought the snack at, the sound of high heels click-clacking towards them draws his attention towards that as he turns around to see who's coming and breathes a sigh of relief as he sees it's just Brandon and the girls.

As he looks down at the floor, he gets another shock as it seemed that Brandon had changed further while he was talking to Lucy. He sees that Brandon's shoes appear a little sturdier and a slight heel has grown out of them. "So like, what's up?" Michelle asks.

Lucy decides to answer before James can. "We were like, talking about how cool it be to like, hit the mall and do some super awesome shopping." Lucy says excitedly.

James expression falls as that was clearly not what they were discussing. But he has no room to protest over all the cheers that came up. "Sounds like we're going, let's take Kandi's car." Heather sugggests.

As the six of them start heading towards Kandi's car, James finds himself starting to sway as he walks and tries to break out of it, he finds he cannot.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: They Have Visitors

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
As much as James wants to tell Lucy that they have more important things to do as the group is heading towards the school parking lot, he finds that he can't say a word. And as he walks along, he feels a tickling on his shoulders and reaches around to find that his hair is now at his shoulders and has darkened to a dark red.

The changes that James knows are now happening to him causes him to glance over at Brandon just to see if he's gone a little farther and much to his chagrin, that does indeed appear to be the case.

The sleeves of Brandon's shirt have shrunk so far up his arms that it appears he's not wearing any sleeves at all, and a few seconds later, they vanish completely.

James had long given up pointing out just what's wrong and is a little saddened to see that Brandon seems to be fitting in with this group of girls, laughing and giggling with them as they talk about the most nonsensical of topics.

They finally reach the parking lot where Kandi had been waiting for them. "So you all ready to go?" she asks.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Meeting With Kandi

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
There's no hesitation on the part of Brandon or the girls as they all quickly nod their heads and start giggling. At that point, Kandi uses the clicker on her keychain to unlock all the doors. "Well hop on in." she says as she gets in the driver seat.

Everyone gets into her SUV with James and Lucy in the backseat. Brandon, Michelle, and Stacy in the middle while Heather sat up front with Kandi. James felt a little bit offended by Brandon not wanting to sit with him but he attributed it to the coin and whatever it's done.

Once Kandi finally pulls it out of the school parking lot, James can't help but keep his eyes on Brandon as he watches his friend change into a ditzy girly as he deduced since he was beginning to act like the new girls he was hanging out with.

Brandon's hair lightens to a honey blonde color as it now reaches his shoulders where it's much more thicker and volumnous as well as shines in the sunlight that's pouring through the SUV.

James was so focused on Brandon's changes that he didn't notice how his pants turned jet black and crawled all the way up between his knees and thighs.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Yes

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
As Kandi was driving towards the mall, Brandon and the girls chit-chat about all sorts of feminine things like where they want to stop first. James is very distrubed at how easily Brandon is slipping into the new role that he's found himself in.

When they finally arrive, Kandi parks the SUV in a parking spot and everyone files out, well everyone except for James and Brandon as Brandon speaks up first. "Hang on I like, gotta text." he says as he pulls out his phone and starts typing away on it.

As Brandon types on his phone, James notices that Brandon had set his wallet down next to him which had gotten larger than before and become made of an expensive black leather material.

When Brandon was done, he put his phone inside his larger wallet and stepped out of the SUV and James' eyes got wide when as Brandon took a step onto the ground he heard a loud 'clack.'

He glanced over at Brandon and noticed that his shoes seem to have grown out a small heel. It's only an inch and a half at the moment but it still has a ways to go before it's complete.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Arriving

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
James is still in the SUV when Brandon takes a few steps forward and notices that James isn't with him. "James come on, what's taking you? We're going to be left behind." he says in a voice that was a little higher pitched as he pickes up his pace to catch up with the girls.

From here on out, James knows he has to get to Lucy and Kandi and get them to go back to the school so they can find the coin and fix whatever's happening and hopefully get it done while there's something left of him and Brandon to save.

He quickly hops out of the SUV and starts chasing after Brandon and the girls when he notices that his legs are starting to move in the same pattern as a woman's would, shaking his small boyish hips side to side with each step he takes.

When he finally catches up to them, they've stopped outside the mall entrance and had waited for him before going inside. "Took you long enough." Brandon says as he and the girls giggle.

James couldn't help but blush as the five of them walked inside and headed towards the directory. James trailed behind them as he watched in horror as Brandon's hips began to expand, getting larger while his jeans altered to fit them.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Heading Inside

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
James couldn't help but pick up his pace as he hurried to the directory where the group was already there, going over which stores they wanted to visit first.

He keeps quiet as it seems like the group is getting really heated on where they want to start first. "I wanna head to Victoria's Secret." Michelle says.

But then Heather speaks up. "Well I wanna head to Claire's and pick up some new threads." she says as she gestures to her clothes.

Brandon then decides to voice his opinion. "Well I think we should like, head to the salon. I could really use a new hairdo." he says as he fluffs out his hair which had grown down to the middle of his back and was a platinum blonde color.

James can't believe just how much of a ditz Brandon is acting and his attention is drawn off his friend as he feels his shirt morph into a yellow tank top that hugs his body tightly.

So do they go with Brandon's suggestion or someone elses?
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Deciding the First Stop

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Once Brandon threw out his idea, the rest of the group considered it and they all decided that it was a good one and went along with it.

James follows along with the group as they head towards where the salon is and James decides he needs to speak up and now. "Hey Lucy, I really think we should go back to the school and get that coin." he whispers to her as he heads towards the front of the group.

Lucy turns her head to face him and gives him a sour look. "Like why should we go back to school when there's like, so much shopping to do?" she says as the group continues on while James stands there dumbfounded.

However, James is quickly broken out of his stupor when he glances at Brandon and sees his hips finish growing out to a delicious 36" wide while his pants kept changing to fit the latest changes to his body.

Maybe if James tried talking to Brandon he could probably get him to leave with him since the school wasn't too far away from the mall. Does it work?
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Brandon's

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
However, just like Lucy, Brandon gives him an almost identical response. "Like, we're at the mall. Why would we want to leave before we like, get our shopping done?" he replies, his speech getting ditzier by the minute.

And like before, James stands still while Brandon continues walking with the girls as they head towards the salon. At that point, James wonders just what he can do now to fix this.

When he looks up, he sees Brandon's jeans start to climb up his legs, reaching his knees and starting to become even more tight against his legs.

And it's when James gets a look at Brandon's legs which begin filling out with womanly tone and muscle, he makes a resolution at that point to fix this even if he has to do it himself.

Turning his back towards Brandon and the group of ditzy girls and Kandi, he leaves the mall intent on making his way back to the school and finding the coin at the snack stand in hopes of getting it back, not knowing that it still was in Lucy's possesion.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: No

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
James bursts through the front door of the mall and starts running off towards the direction of the school as fast as he can. He doesn't make it very far though, about halfway through the parking lot before he has to stop and catch his breath. "One of the problems of not staying in shape." he mutters to himself as he decides to continue on while walking.

Once he catches his breath, he decides to pick up the pace a little bit as he breaks into a slight jog. As he's jogging, he can feel his own changes continuing on, with his hair turning black with some brown highlights in it as it grows out to just past his shoulders where it shines and is very luxurious.

As he's jogging, a car suddenly drives by that he recognizes and it makes a U-turn and starts coming back towards him. "Not good." he mutters as he dives into some bushes to hide.

Back at the mall, Brandon and the girls have finally arrived at the salon and they're discussing what they should do first. While they're doing this, Brandon's arms slim out and become much more dainty and feminine appearing.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: With James

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
While James is hiding in the bushes, he hears the car park itself and the door open and then close. "I can't let him see me like this." James mutters as looks through a small clearing in the leaves, hoping that the person who hopped out of the car will pass by without seeing him.

The person in question was Mark Stansberg, Dave's best friend and now the biggest bully in the school now that Dave is Reese Witherspoon in mind and body. Mark looked around and was fuming that he couldn't find James. "I know I saw him. He's probably hiding somewhere." he says as he walks off in another direction.

James breathes a sigh as he knows he's safe and steps out from the bushes when he sees the coast is clear. As he slowly walks down the sidewalk, he becomes aware of a click-clacking noise with each step he takes and looks down in shock as he sees that his shoes are now a pair of black high heels.

"I better hurry before whatever's going on overtakes me." he says as he speeds up his pace towards the school.

Meanwhile back at the mall, Brandon and the girls decided on getting manicures done first and when Brandon is done with his manicure, his hand is much slimmer and feminine, topped with inch long manicured nails with a red finish on them.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: The Person in the Car

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Since James knows he's in the clear, he can take it a little bit slower to catch his breath before picking up the pace again to continue heading towards the school. As he's walking he feels his wallet and it seems to want to burst out of his back pocket.

He reaches back and pulls it out and is shocked to see that the normally brown color of it is now a deep red and appears to be getting larger. Upon feeling something else going on with his pants, he reaches back to feel his behind and finds that the back pockets are now gone.

As he continues walking, he hears Mark's voice again. "Maybe he came this way." the bully shouts which causes James to groan and dive behind yet another bush and try to hide, still holding his wallet in his hand.

Back at the salon, Brandon had decided that just getting his nails done was good enough so he decided to sit out in the lobby while he waited for his friends to finish up. As he was sitting there, he decides to call James and ask him when he'd be back. While he was doing this, his ass began to fill out with womanly flesh and tissue, starting the beginning of a delicious bubble shape.

While James was hiding in the bushes, he heard the phone that was now inside his wallet starting to go off. But was it a ringtone or a vibration?
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Continue With James' Journey

choices: I'll Be There When I'm Done
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
James feels his heart plummet as he hears the phone inside the wallet beginning to vibrate. It's not very loud but it certainly is making noise and he hopes it's not loud enough for Mark to be able to hear it.

"Please don't let him hear that." he says quietly to himself as his eyes widen upon hearing his voice which is much higher pitched than before, almost breathier as well.

After a few more minutes, James can see Mark looking around and shrugging his shoulders. "I guess he must've went in the mall. Probably went shopping with his sissy friends. Let's go look there." Mark says to his companions as they get back into his car and drive back to the mall.

When they're gone, James can still hear his phone vibrating so he reaches into his large wallet to pull it out and see that it's Brandon calling. "Hello?" he asks and winces as he hears his new voice in full effect.

"Like hey James where you at? Me and the girls are like, wondering what's going on." Brandon replies as James gets worried as he hears that Brandon's voice is very high pitched and even more breathy and sultrier than his own along with his increasingly ditzy speech.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: Vibration

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Before James gives his answer, he finds a strange stirring in his mind, pushing him to tell them that he'll be right over there, but his better judgement wins out, at least for now. "I've actually got something I got to get done but I'll be there once I get that done." he replies.

Back in the salon, Brandon is a little bit disappointed that his friend won't be there sooner but understands. "That's ok, me and the girls will like, be here for awhile so like, don't feel like you have to rush." he replies.

James still can't get over how ditzy Brandon is sounding and tries to not concentrate on it. "Ok Brandon, see you in a little bit." he replies as he hangs up.

James is about to put the phone in one of his pockets when he remembers that they vanished so he goes to put it in his wallet. However he finds that it's finished it's change into a large red leather purse. He sighs to himself as he places it inside and continues heading towards the school.

Back at the mall, the girls had finished their salon treatments and looked even more gorgeous than ever. Brandon was continuing his change into one of them as his own wallet morphed into a large black leather purse.

Lucy meanwhile still had the coin and looked over her cheerleader outfit and thought about making a wish.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: I'll Be There When I'm Done

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
However, she glances at Brandon and decides that his changes aren't far along enough for her to make this next wish so she decides to wait until Brandon's far enough that it would have an effect on him. "He'll be like, so totally awesome when I'm done with him." she says quietly under her breath.

Speaking of Brandon, he sees his friends emerge and gushes over how pretty they now look, especially Michelle. "Wow Michelle, your hair looks super awesome, maybe I should've like, had mine done too." he says as he pouts, his lips starting to puff out as he does so.

Michelle walks over to him and wraps his arm around him in a manner of consolation. "Don't like, worry Brands, we can like, set you up, we don't mind waiting." she says.

Brandon's eyes light up when he hears her say that. "You like, mean it?" he asks as Michelle and the rest of the girls nod their heads. "Ok then I'll like, go ahead and go back." he says as one of the stylists leads him to one of the chairs.

When the stylist gets him set up, Brandon tells her what he'd like her to do and she gets to work making his hair even more gorgeous than it was before.
1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.title: She Holds Off For Now

1231111111111122111111121112111111111212.content:
Meanwhile, James was still walking towards the school when he was feeling a little bit exhausted and felt his stomach rumble. He spotted a convenience store just across the street. He glanced towards the direction where the school was at before looking back at the store. "Well, maybe a quick stop won't hurt." he says to himself as he crosses the street to the store.

Once inside, he starts looking around at all the snacks that they have.
