Bryan waltzed over to the two boys like his cocky self “you boys realize how bad you screwed me over, I know what this coin knows that little Brandon boy here made my gender reassignment permanent by focusing and I’m pretty pissed I have to possess this diva” Bryan grunted then grinned “James, Katie is going to be living with you for now on” James got a nosebleed sobbing as Katie’s thoughts and personality permeated his brain.

Bryan breathed a sigh of relief, and glanced over at James who was being haunted by voices unfamiliar. “Now about this weak little body her abdomen began stretching up there and gained Bryan’s old height. Her d cups deminishing by the minute as pecs, abs, delts, quads, delts, traps, ,biceps and triceps all sprang to life gaining mass until a massive female bodybuilder stood before them bigger than Bryan ever was hard angles vaguely outlined her still georgeous face. She grinned “I can do better” a masculine husk to her voice she was taken aback and her eyes lit up like Christmas trees as her a cup athletic pancakes dissolved into her large veiny saturated pecs. Her face grew harder as she passed the 4 hundred threshold the magical fabric of the bikini stretched to accommodate what the boys saw, a clitoral bulge under her hem and gulped. Bryan stopped growing and examined herself she was the biggest female bodybuilder in the world “I wanted side effects you guys ripped me off.” Her voice a deep baritone. “I’m going to use this thing to rule the world!”

“Not so fast!” A rift opened up and two figures popped out it was Loki and Maui. We created this coin to stir up strife.” Loki’s said grinning Maui sighed “if you were going to warp the boys lives that would be fine people of my islands have been doing that for years but you can’t rule my people.” Bryan looks scared frightened she wishes for the only thing that can subdue the to be a god. Maui and Loki weaken and collapse to the ground and a blinding flash blinds them when they can see they see a 100 foot golden goddess that still resembles the twisted Bryan-Katie form “Behold I am CALLAMASTIA GOD KILLER CURSED OF FEMALE VIRTUE!” Her voice boomed and shook mountains.
1313312222222112111112.title: It Isn't

131332221.content:
"Hey James, how about we hit the arcade and see what new games they have in." Brandon suggests as they head towards the mall arcade. Normally when they have some spare time, they go there to kill some time and have fun.

James looks towards the arcade to see that it doesn't appear to be too crowded. "Ok that sounds like a good idea." James replies.

And with that the two of them start heading towards the arcade but what game do they decide to stop at?
131332221.title: Arcade

1313322212221.content:
The boys then head over towards the arcades and are a little stunned to see that there's a Final Fantasy X one there since it's normally console only. "Let's check it out anyway." Brandon suggests to which James nods his head to.

The two of them head over there and luckily there's no one using or currently waiting to use it so there's no wait for them to get on it as quickly as possible. "Oh awesome, it's even multiplayer. I've always wanted to try that out and see how it would work." James says excitedly.

They each put fifty cents in to give it a play. Brandon settles on Tidus as he was always a fan of that character but James still had a decision to make on who he wanted to play as. "Come on man there are plenty of other good choices to pick from." Brandon says.

James just shoos him off. "Of course there are. Although it's hard to choose so I'll just pick one at random." he says as he pushes the random button on the machine. Where does it land?
1313322212221.title: Final Fantasy X

13133222122211.content:
Yuna

http://images.wikia.com/finalfantasy/ima...

James just sighs as the randomizer lands on Yuna. "I should've just picked Auron and saved myself the trouble." he groans to himself. It's not that he didn't like Yuna the character or how pretty she was. Rather that she was a pretty weak fighter.

The game begins and they start playing. Needless to say that Brandon was getting the upper hand due not only to his superior gaming skills but also the fact that his character is much more powerful.

Brandon is mercilessly pounding on James until finally the game ends. "Should've gone with a better character but we both know that you're a sucker for the pretty ones." Brandon says as he pats his buddy on the back.

James just sighs and slips his hands into his pockets, unaware that he's brushing his hand up against the coin. "Yea she sure is pretty, I just wish that I could get to know her even though she's a video game character." he says as he pulls his hands out of his pocket to see that the coin's glowing. "Uh oh." James mutters.

What happens now?
13133222122211.title: Yuna

131332221222111.content:
The two of them stare at the coin and wait for something to happen since they both know from previous experience that when it glows, that means that a wish had been granted. "I wonder how it's going to interpret it." James muses aloud.

They stood there and stared at the coin while looking around to see if the video game girl would appear anywhere but didn't see her at all. And when the coin stopped glowing they figured it must've been a dud wish.

But just then James vanished into thin air and dropped the coin on the ground before he disappeared. "James where are you?" Brandon asks frantically as he looks around trying to find his friend. It doesn't take him too long though as he glances over at the arcade, "You gotta be kidding me." he says as he slowly starts walking over to it.

Brandon can't believe his eye as he sees James inside the game itself and he stares right at it. "So I guess instead of bringing Yuna to him, the wish brought him to Yuna." he decides although he has no idea just how correct in that assumption he is.

Meanwhile James had just arrived in the world of Spira and is looking around to get his bearings. "Just where in the hell am I and more importantly how do I get out of here and back home?" he asks himself.

James then starts walking around this new zone which is strangely familiar to him for some reason he can't quite put his finger on in hopes of finding someone or something that can help him get back home.
131332221222111.title: James Vanishes

1313322212221112.content:
As James is walking around, he takes note of the fact that his surroundings look nothing like how they would in the real world. Everything looks like it's made up of pixils and animated like a video game. He starts to think that maybe he got sucked inside of it but just shakes his head. "Nah that's just too weird to be real." he reasons as he continues on.

He only gets a few paces further ahead when he comes to a quick realization. "Well the fact that me and Brandon stumbled upon a magic coin that grants wishes does change my view on what's possible and impossible so me being in a video game world isn't all that farfetched afterall." he decides and continues on.

Back at the arcade, Brandon knows that he can't take the machine home with him when he remembers the coin on the ground. "Hopefully this works." he says as a plan fomulates inside his head as he goes straight to the parking lot to hop in his car to go back home.

Meanwhile in Spira, James continues walking down the winding path wondering if there's going to be any sign of salvation in sight. "There's gotta be something out here, it can't just be nothing for miles." he says exasperated as his voice rises up higher in pitch.

Finally he sees what looks like a building in the distance. "Finally some sign of civilization." he says excitedly as he starts to rush over to it to see what it is and hopefully find someone there who can help him get back home.
1313322212221112.title: Finds Something

13133222122211121.content:
As James gets closer and closer to the building he starts to be able to make out what it is. "It almost looks like Rin's Travel agency from the game." he says to himself.

It's not long after that when he arrives that he realizes that his suspicions were right as it is indeed a branch of Rin's Travel Agency. And the hovercraft and chocobos that surround it only confirm this fact. "Wait, chocobos and a hovercraft? This must mean I'm on the Mi'hen Highroad. No wonder this place looked familiar.

Little did he know however, his familiarity with this area wasn't because of his experience from playing the game but rather from personal experience and having actually visited this place.

"Hopefully there's someone inside." he says as he goes towards the door and opens it up to go inside. As he does so, his height begins to shrink to a diminuative 5' 4" tall which is Yuna's height and his bodyframe dwindles to become more feminine in stature.

*********Real World***********

Meanwhile, Brandon had just gotten into his car and before starting it up, he pulled the coin out to make a wish. "I wish that as I was driving, I could go as fast as I wanted and run red lights and stop signs and not get into an accident or get pulled over." he says.

The coin glows and he sticks it in his pocket before starting the car up and pulling out of his parking spot as fast as he can before pulling out into the street and flying down the road at breakneck speeds.
13133222122211121.title: Rin's Travel Agency

131332221222111211.content:
Although Brandon could go thorugh traffic without any damage being done or being levied any fines, that didn't change the fact that the people who had to wait for him weren't pissed off and weren't shy about showing it with their yelling and middle fingers to which Brandon replied to in kind.

"It's an emergency damn it." he yells back at them but they don't seem to really care about his needs. 'If only they knew exactly what I was rushing for.' he thought to himself.

************Spira************

Once inside the Travel Agency, he quickly heads towards the counter to the person working behind it to explain his situation. "Excuse me I was wondering if you could help me?" he asks.

The Al Bhed receptionist looks up from her computer to see James and gives him a warm inviting smile. "Yes, is there something you need?" she says politely.

James clears his throat as he tries to figure out just how he wants to phrase his question. As he cleared his throat, his vocal chords began tightening so that the next time he spoke, it would be in a much higher pitched voice. "I was wondering if you could help me get to my home from here?" he asks.

She continues having that warm smile as she replies to his question. "And where exactly do you live at so that I can give you proper directions?" she asks. How does James answer?
131332221222111211.title: Getting Home

1313322212221112112.content:
James immediately wants to answer his original house and original address but for some reason it's not coming in clear to him. 'Why is it so difficult for me to remember exactly where I live?' he thinks to himself.

Something is beginning to come back to him. An island of some sorts although the details aren't all that clear yet. "I think I live somewhere on an island but I'm not sure exactly where it's at." he says as he tries his best recollection of his home.

As he keeps trying to think of anything that would get him a better picture of his home, his age jumps up to eighteen making him just as old as Yuna is.

The receptionist just nods her head. "There are quite a few islands or sets of islands that are in the world do you at least know the name of it?" she asks.


***************Real World**************

Brandon had just arrived home and rushed up into his bedroom in the house where luckily no one else was home yet. "I hope this works." he says as he puts his copy of FFX-2 inside his PS2 console and powers it on. "I wish that James was in this game." he says and waits for it to take effect.
1313322212221112112.title: Somewhere Else

13133222122211121121.content:
Brandon holds the coin in his hand and waits for the warmth and glow to take effect. There's nothing happening for a few seconds which begins to worry him. But then he feels the wish taking effect which he finally knows works as he sees James appearing on his screen.

"Awesome, I can keep track of him now. It looks like he's in Rin's Travel Agency, but which one is it?" he asks himself as he picks up the controller and uses it to bring up the menu. "Looks like he's on the Mi'hen Highroad. But how do I get him out of there and back here." he mutters.

Just then the front door opens and Brandon's eyes go wide. "Brandon I'm home!." his mother yells.

******************Spira******************

Meanwhile, James felt a little woozy, almost as if he was frozen in place for a second before being able to move again. "What was that all about?" he quietly says to himself, not aware that when Brandon brought up the menu, it froze him in place. This was just the beginning of him being integrated into the game.

That's when he brings his attention back to the receptionist. "I'm sorry if this sounds a little dumb but I can't seem to remember it at all." he replies. "Thank you for everything though." he says to her.

The receptionist just shakes her head as James' hair starts to gain a bit of a brown tint to it as it grows down just to the middle of his ears. "Don't worry about it sweetie it happens to all of us. I wish you the best of luck in finding your way home." she says as James nods his head at her and leaves the travel agency.
13133222122211121121.title: It Works

131332221222111211211.content:
As Brandon hears the footsteps coming up the stairs, he quickly glances at the TV. "Damn it what am I going to do? If she sees my playing on the Playstation I'm going to be in big trouble." he says as his eyes go back and forth from the bedroom door to the TV screen as his priorities are constantly shifting between helping James and saving his own hide.

Once the bedroom door opens, he remembers the coin and reaches for it just as his mom steps in. "What are you doing young man? I told you that you were grounded. Well now you're going to get it." she says as she glances at the coin in his hand.

In one swift motion, she reaches down and snatches it from his hand. "This looks like something you might have stolen again so I'm going to hang onto it and I want you to shut the system off right now while I think about your punishment." she says as she walks away leaving a flabbergasted Brandon.

"This can't lead to anywhere good." he says to himself.

***************Spira*****************

James had just left Rin's Travel Agency and stood outside of it for a few moments. The breeze blows some strands of his longer hair in front of his eyes. "I really need to get this cut soon." he says as he brushes some of it back. As he does that, he feels like his entire body structure is beginning to compress on itself as he has a much more feminine bodyframe.

Knowing that not far down the road is Luca, he figures that would be a good place to start looking. But as it's nighttime and the road is filled with fiends, he decides to wait it out till morning.
131332221222111211211.title: Brandon's in Trouble

1313322212221112112111.content:
James at first is thinking about camping outside but when a cold breeze followed by a wolf's howl causes him to rethink that decision. "Maybe it would be better if I tried to get a room here for the night. But how am I going to do that if I don't have any money?" he asks himself as he heads back inside.

As he once again approaches receptionist desk, he nervously reaches his hands into his pockets, wishing he still had the coin on him but remembered that it had dropped off of him when he entered this world. But he finds something odd in his pockets and pulls out some strange bills. 'This has gotta be gil. Talk about your good luck.' he thinks to himself.

He gets to the desk and places the gil on the table. "Hello again, I was wondering if I could get a room for the night?" he asks as a pair of yellow armbands appear on each arm right by the elbows.

The receptionst looks up at him with that familiar smile. "Well sure we'd be happy to accomdate you." she replies as she accepts his money and then hands him a key. "Room 105 and please enjoy your stay." she says.

*****************Real World*******************

Brandon sullenly shut the Playstation off and sat down on the bed wondering how he was going to get the stone from her. "I have to get it back before she makes an absentminded wish that would cause some serious issues." he says to himself.

Little did he know that exact scenario was taking place as his mom paced around the kitchen with the coin gripped firmly in her hand. "He's so irresponsible. Sometimes I wish that..."
1313322212221112112111.title: Back at Rin's

13133222122211121121111.content:
"He's so irresponsible. Sometimes I wish that he was like me." she says when she sets the coin down on the counter immediately after making the wish so she doesn't see it glow or feel it get warm in her hand as she gets started making dinner.

Brandon is still up in his room, plotting a way for him to get the coin back when he suddenly sits straight up in his bed and stares straight ahead. "Why do I feel so strange all of a sudden?" he asks himself as he looks around his room to get his bearings and decides that it's just the events of the day getting to him.

He lays back down wondering what he's going to do, not even noticing that his room is beginning to change around him, things like his posters and the clothing in his closet vanishing into thin air. "Maybe there's something good on TV." he says to himself as he flips on the TV and starts channel surfing.

***************Spira******************

With the key in hand, James heads down the hallway until he sees the room labelled 105. "Looks like this is it." he says to himself as he opens it up and lets himself in. It's nothing fancy like you'd see at a Hilton or a Marriott but it would certainly do as it was better than staying outside.

At least there was a sphere TV he could watch and he plops himself down on the bed to watch some TV until he gets tired. One thing that he finds interesting is that there's no mention of Yuna at all. "That's weird, you'd think they'd mention the summoner who defeated Sin for good." he says to himself.

He doesn't even notice that as he lays down on the pillow, his arms begin to slim out, becoming much more dainty and delicate, befitting the woman he's becoming.
13133222122211121121111.title: He Was Like Me

131332221222111211211111.content:
During the night James was tossing and turning on the bed, having strange dreams playing out before him. In them it was like he was playing the game again but from the POV of one of the characters. That night he dreamt that he had just acquired the first Aeon, Valefor.

When he woke up, he shook his head to clear his head of that dream and just how vivid and real it felt to him. "I just think it's this place getting to me." he says to himself as he gets out of bed to get dressed. Little does he know just how right he is.

Once he's fully dressed, he's about to head towards the door when he notices something sitting on the dresser counter that wasn't there before. "Where did this come from?" he asks aloud as he heads over to it.

What is on there is a brown leather belt with two holsters that are holding two loaded guns. He takes one of them out and checks it out. "This will certainly help me out as I make my way down the Highroad and into Luca." he says to himself as he straps the belt around his waist and leaves the room.

****************Real World*****************

As Brandon continues to watch TV, he now has two problems he has to figure out how he's going to resolve, the first one being about getting the coin from his mom and the second one being that getting James back into the real world.

And that's when he slaps himself on the head for being so stupid. "Why didn't I realize that I could just use the coin to wish him back instead? That solves both problems at once." he says to himself as he gets out of bed, hoping that he'll be able to find the coin before his mom uses or hides it.

Too bad for him that she has already done both as she takes the coin and puts it in her purse. As Brandon makes his way downstairs he doesn't notice that his hair has started getting longer, reaching his ears and beginning to take on a reddish tint.
131332221222111211211111.title: The Next Morning

1313322212221112112111111.content:
As Brandon approaches his mom with the intent of talking to her about the wishing coin, she sees him first and looks at him sternly. "What are you doing out of your room young man? I thought I had grounded you." she says as her eyes are staring directly at him.

But before Brandon could answer, his mom's, Paula's eyes suddenly glass over before regaining their focus. "Sorry honey, I meant to say would you be interested in helping me out with dinner?" she asks sweetly.

Brandon is no doubt a little confused about her sudden change of moods but he's not about to look a gift horse in the mouth and decides to go along with it. "Sure mom, I'd love to." he says as he follows her towards the stove.

As they start getting the things out that were needed to get dinner ready, Brandon's changes continued as his body shrank into something much more petite and delicate. His arms followed suit becoming much slimmer and womanly.

**********Spira***********

James had just exited his room and made his way to the front counter and returned the key. "So how was your stay?" the receptionist asks.

James gives her a warm smile. "It was actually very nice. If I'm ever around again I'll be sure to stop in here for rest." he says much to the receptionists satisfaction. "Well we're very glad to have you as a customer and look forward to seeing you again." she says.

The two of them say their goodbyes and James heads out of the Travel Agency and glances down the highroad towards Luca. As he does so his shoes start to compress on his feet as well as climb up to his shins. "Looks like I'm off." he says as he begins his journey.
1313322212221112112111111.title: Confrontation With Mom

13133222122211121121111111.content:
Feeling strangely confident and uplifted, James made his way down the Mi'hen Highroad and was surprised at how peaceful it was with people riding chocobos as well as the hovercraft flying by causing some dust to be blasted at James, which at one point made him stop and have to sneeze. "Wow, I don't remember this place being this bad." he mutters to himself.

He continues going along and that statement he just made brings him a bit of confusion as it's not possible for him to know how dusty the Highroad is just by playing the game as it would only be something that could be brought on by personal experience. Little does he know that the game is continuing to integrate himself into it.

His journey is suddenly stopped by the appearance of a wolf fiend which is snarling at him in rage. He grabs both guns and aims them at the wolf. "I just knew these would come in handy." he says to himself.

James is easily able to dispatch this fiend quickly and watches as its body fades into pyreflies. Satisfied with himself, he continues onward but doesn't make it too much farther when he finds himself surrounded by three more of the same fiend. "This can't be good." he says as both guns are drawn once again, this time held in smaller, daintier hands.

***************Real World****************

Brandon is helping his mom chop up some vegtables and fruit for the dinner they were going to make together, Brandon finding himself being able to do this with a strange ease. 'This certainly is weird.' he thinks to himself.

Even more weirder if he was able to notice would be that his age began climbing, leaving sixteen and reaching twenty. Although he grew in age, he lost a couple of inches, making him 5' 4"
13133222122211121121111111.title: On the Road Again

131332221222111211211111112.content:
The three wolves surrounded James who was doing circles, trying to keep an eye on all of them at once but it was difficult as they moved in a synchornized pattern, playing with their prey before they decided to pounce.

But before they were able to do anything, two girls jumped into the circle to back up James. One of them was a blonde girl in a really skimpy outfit carrying two daggers for weapons. The other one meanwhile was a taller, short grey haired woman with piercing red eyes, wielding a giant sword. "Looks like you could use a hand." the taller on says cooly.

James can't believe his luck as he immdiately recognizes them as Paine and Rikku. "You have no idea how glad I am to see the two of you." he says as he knows that now he has a chance at surviving this encounter.

Just before the battle begins, James starts to feel some more fighting skills come to him as if he had been training for years. 'As weird as this feels, it's certainly coming in handy.' he thinks to himself as he prepares for battle with the fiends.

****************Real World*****************

Meanwhile, back in the real world, Brandon and his mother had finished getting the dinner prepared and put it in the oven. Once that was done, the two of them sat down at the kitchen table to start talking. "So how are things going?" Paula asks.

Brandon's not really sure what to say about this since his mom had been acting really weird. Before he can give his answer, his changes go further. His shoes turn a bright gold sturdy material and the toe opens up, exposing red painted townails.
131332221222111211211111112.title: Help For James

1313322212221112112111111121.content:
After some more circling by the wolves, they finally stop with each of them setting their gaze on either James, Rikku, or Paine respectively. "Let's get the jump on them before they make a move." Paine whispers to the two of them who nod their heads in agreement.

Rikku is the first one to make a move since she has the highest speed, jumping high up into the air and crashing down on one of the wolves, slicing away at it with her daggers causing it to fall to the ground and disintigrate into pyreflies like the one that James encountered alone earlier.

The plan goes a little bit awry as the death of it's companion causes one of the other ones to jump at the group however he is slashed with Paine's sword as is soars towards them and then crumples into the ground in a heap, befalling the same fate as the companion it had sought to avenge.

The last one followed suit and charged at James this time, showing it's sharp teeth. James was prepared for this and pulled the trigger on both guns, sending a pair of bullets hitting the beast in the heart, killing it instantly.

With the three wolves killed, Rikku and Paine stood next to their companion. Before they said something, the changes to James continued with his shoes climbing all the way to his knees, turning a dark navy. They now were a pair of lace-up boots which hugged his slender legs tightly.

*****************Real World******************

Brandon has no idea how to answer his mom's question and thinks about it for a moment when something comes to him suddenly. "Work's been a little tought but other than that things have been good." he replies wondering when he got a job or what possesed him to say that.

Just as Brandon's waist begins to pull in, becoming more delicate, the smoke alarm starts going off. "Just what is that?" Paula asks as she gets up to see what's causing it.
1313322212221112112111111121.title: Battle

13133222122211121121111111211.content:
The three of them stood together and Rikku and Paine seemed pleased with how well James handled himself and make a decision amongst themselves which they let James in on. "You handled yourself pretty well just now kid." Paine says as she places a hand on James' shoulder.

James can't help but blush at Paine's compliment. "Thanks, although this is the first time I've ever actually fired a gun before." he says as he glances over at the pistols which are resting in his holsters.

Rikku steps up and places her own hand on James' shoulder. "Well you certainly handled one like an expert." she says as she glances over at Paine who nods her head. "So we were wondering if you'd like to come with us. We've been looking for another traveling compainion and you seem pretty capable." she says.

James is bewildered about the offer as he would be honored to travel with those two and that would certainly make his journey that much easier. Before he gave his answer, the right leg of his pants vanished leaving him with just one which was starting to turn blue.

**************Real World***************

The source of the smoke alarm coming off as it turned out was coming from the dinner which they had forgotten about during their conversation and had burned as a result. "Well now what are we going to do?" Paula asks.

Before Brandon gives his answer, he feels a bulging in his pocket and reaches in it to pull out his wallet which was getting bigger. His pockets then vanished once they were empty
13133222122211121121111111211.title: Two New Companions

131332221222111211211111112111.content:
It's a no-brainer question for James as he would love nothing more than to travel alongside Paine and Rikku. "Sure I'd absolutly love to travel with you." he says excitedly.

Rikku is happy to have a new traveling companion to come along with them while Paine just gives a slight smile. "And we're happy to have you along with us." she says cheerfully when she comes up with another question. "So what exactly are you doing out here?" she asks.

James shrugs his shoulders. "Trying to get back home but I'm having trouble remembering where home is so I've just been wandering until I find it." he replies as the three of them start heading down the Highroad again towards Luca. "The only thing I can remember is that it's on an island but the name of it escapes me." he continues.

Rikku and Paine try to process this information in their own minds as they continue walking. Along the way, James' eyes undergo a strange transformation as one of them turns blue while the other turns green with a spiral pattern in it, signifying Al Bhed heritage.

******************Real World********************

As Brandon looks at his bigger wallet, an idea comes to him. "How about we go out and get something to eat." he suggests as he really enjoys going out to eat. After this, a pair of gold dangly earrings appear in each of his earlobes.

Paula thinks about it as she reaches into her purse and accidentally brushes the coin. "Yea but I wish that we had time to do some shopping and go to the salon before the restaurants get busy.
131332221222111211211111112111.title: Answers

1313322212221112112111111121111.content:
Brandon is unable to see the coin go off or notice that the time had gone back by two hours which would give the two of them plenty of time to get some errands done before heading to the restaurant. Paula glances up at the clock to see that they now have the time they need. "Actually that sounds like a good idea Brandon, let's go." she says as she slings her purse over her shoulder.

Brandon follows along, carrying his wallet in his hand which had turned gold to match his shoes. It was much bigger and sealed with a clasp and carried all of his important things like makeup, money, and credit cards and ID.

***************Spira*******************

Rikku is a little bit saddened by James' story. "Thats so sad to hear James, how about if you help us get back to Besaid, we'll help you find your way home?" she asks.

James looks up and nods his head at her. "Sure thing, I'd be more than happy to give you help in exchange for assisting me." he replies as his voice gets higher and a smile breaks out on his face as he knows that things are really looking up for him.

"It's settled then." Rikku yells excitedly as she jumps up in the air, with her fist extended triumphantly. The three of them continue onwards as a full party until suddenly they stop as they see something. "Is that what I think it is?" Rikku asks as she takes a few steps forward to see what it is.
1313322212221112112111111121111.title: Wish Granted

13133222122211121121111111211111.content:
It's not just Rikku whos excited about what she sees as James also is happy to see the sight that caught the young Al Bhed girl's eyes. "Alright, we've finally arrived at Luca." he says as he gives Rikku a light high five in celebration.,

With their goal in sight, the three of them make their way down the staircase which leads into the town. Once thing they notice is that there seems to be a lot of people walking around the streets below as if there was some big event going on in town.

"Just what could be going on here?" Paine asks as she leads the three of them through the town. They don't bother asking anyone since the people walking around seem to be engrossed in their own little worlds not paying attention to anything else.

During this conversation, Branther's pantlegs fuse together, forming a bluish green skirt which shows off his shapely, womanly legs nicely. At this point, he feels a rumbling in his stomach. "Gotta use the restroom." he says as he instinctively reaches down to pick up his purse.

Go ahead and take this cab and thanks for everything that you've done. We'll try and find the next one." the male in the other group says before looking for another cab.

Getting to the arcade and looking around, both boys were surprised to see a Soul Calibur game there.

"That's pretty surprising, but not unwelcome." said Brandon.

"I suppose." said James.

They both walked closer to the game, waiting for those already playing it to finish up. Brandon seemed to keep thinking as time went on. James began to wonder what he was up to.

"Okay Brandon, what are you plotting?" asked James, knowing how Brandon's mind worked.

"Oh, I was just thinking. What if we were in that world?" asked Brandon.

"What?" asked James.

"In the Soul Calibur world I mean. Doesn't that sound awesome?" asked Brandon, a smile forming.

"Perhaps a little, but I'm kind of cautious about going into another world." said James. As they talked, Brandon's hands subconsiously grabbed the coin in his pocket.

"True, but I really do wish we could be there." said Brandon.

As he said that, because he was grasping the coin, the coin began to flash. Brandon and James both saw the flash from Brandon's pocket.

"Nice going genius!" said James, almost wanting to smack him.

Before any of that could happen though, the light engulfed both of them, escorting them both from the real world.

James soon felt the cold hard ground beneath him. He felt like he had been floating in limbo for who knows how long. He did feel sore though, like he landed hard on the ground.

"Ow, damn, I'm sore every where." spoke James.

Instantly, he gasped, bring his hand to his mouth. That didn't sound like him at all. It was far too high and too...feminine. Looking up, James could see that his hand was also gloved, even though he knew he wasn't wearing gloves before. As he turned his head, a lock of blonde hair flew into his face, causing him to tuck it back.

"W-What happened?!" cried James as he finally sat up.

He finally got a good look at himself, stunned speechless by what he saw. He was glad in some white dress-like tunic, with thigh-high boots on his legs. He felt a weight on his chest, and immediately looked down to see two mounds sticking out. Near a panic, James touched around his body, feeling a totally alien feeling from everywhere. The kicker was when he felt down his groin, and felt no bulge at all beneath the skirt he was wearing.

"W-Where am I?" came a voice from behind James.

James turned around and saw a feminine figure sit up a few yards from him. He noticed who it could be. It was Yan Leixia, more commonly known as Leixia. He would recognize that look anywhere from his knowledge of the game.

Wait. The game....

"J-James?" asked "Leixia", causing James to yelp and turn around. The only way this person could know his name was...

"Brandon?" asked James.

The two of them stood there dumbfounded, as they looked into the faces of Pyrrha Alexandra and Yan Leixia.

Brandon said little did they know those guys on the cover we're Naruto and Jiraiya since they couldn't be here they had too turn into them.

choices: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
131332222221.content:
Brandon and James were at the used video game store as they decided that they wanted to find an old video game to play.

Both boys went off in different sections with Brandon heading into the original Playstation aisle, and James going into the N64 aisle. And that's when James found something cool. "Hey Brandon check this out." he says.

Brandon drops what he's doing and goes over towards James. "What did you find?" he asks as he makes his way over towards where he is.

Whatever it was that James found, it certainly got him excited as he's jumping up and down like he had won the lottery. Once Brandon arrives there, he tries to calm him down. "Chill out dude, you're making an idiot of yourself." he says.

The smile doesn't leave James' face no matter what Brandon says to him. "I don't care man, look at what I found." he says as he holds up the game box to Brandon.

Brandon's eyes go wide as well as he starts to feel some of James' excitement pouring into him. "Wow, that game's pretty hard to find." he says. What game is it?
131332222221.title: Used Video Game Store

1313322222211.content:
Both boys just stared at the game box, almost as if they were holding pure gold in their hands. "Wow, I can't believe we were able to find it so easily." Brandon says.

James nods his head. "Yea I know, let's go home and check it out." he says. With that, they take the game up to the counter and pay for it before heading back out into the mall. "What do you say we head home right now and try it out?" Brandon asks.

Nodding his head once again, James pulls out the coin. "Sure thing. I wish we were back at my house." he says.

And with that, both boys found themselves inside James' bedroom. "So let's get this started." James says as he gets the game set up.

Without warning, James little sister Karen, peeks her head through the bedroom door. "Mom says make sure to take out the trash before bed." she says.

James waves her off. "Yea whatever, I'll do it." he says as he powers the game on. They decide to start from an already saved file which is saved at what location?
1313322222211.title: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

13133222222111.content:
"I want to try this one since it's the furthest ahead." James says as he pulls up the file that has the game saved at the Gerudo Desert. When he loads the game he sees that it's just the very beginning when adult Link first arrives there.

As James is going through the items that this person had on Link, Brandon is holding the coin as an idea flashes through his mind. "Hey I got a fun idea. How about we wish ourselves into a spot in the game and get to see it first hand." he suggests.

James eyes go wide with excitement as he seems to like this idea. "Very good idea Brandon, let's try it out." he says.

Brandon nods his head. "Do you want to go first?" he asks to which James nods his head. Upon that, Brandon hands him the coin. "Have fun." he tells him.

As James is trying to decide what point of the game he wants to teleport himself to, he sees a Gerudo NPC walk by on the screen which gives him an idea. "I got it, I'll go to the Gerudo desert. I've always wanted to see one of those gorgeous women up close." he says.

Brandon chuckles at James comment. "Well buddy, this is your opportunity so go ahead and do it." he says.

Grinning to himself, James clutches the coin in his hands and makes his wish. "I wish that I was in the game at the Gerudo Desert." he says when suddenly a bright flash erupts which sends him into the game itself at the location.
13133222222111.title: Gerudo Desert

131332222221111.content:
When James woke up from his transportation into the video game, he was a little stunned to find himself laying on the sand. He quickly to up and looked around at his surroundings. "Wow, it worked." he says aloud.

One thing he notices though is that everything seems to be pixilated as if he was really in the video game. He looks down at himself to see that he is still completely normal. "Wow this is really awesome." he says aloud with excitement.

He begins walking around the desert, hoping to find some sort of shelter at first and tries to find out where the Gerudo area is, hoping they might help him.

While he was walking, he felt a strange chill go down his spine which caused him to pause for a moment. "What was that?" he asked aloud.

Little did he know that the video game cartridge detected an unknown intruder in it's programming and had begun the process to bind it to the game itself, making it part of it's programming.

Meanwhile, Brandon was excited as he saw James walking around in the desert. "Oh wow, he's really in there, this is so cool." he says as he watches this all play out.

James walks for a bit before he something happens to him.
131332222221111.title: Waking Up

1313322222211112.content:
As James is walking through the desert, he wishes that he had brought some water with him as he is starting to feel exhausted from the heat and sun pouring down on him.

That's when he realized that he could use the coin to wish for water. However as he searched his clothes, he was dismayed to find that the coin had gone. "Oh no this is bad." he said as he searched the sands trying to find it.

Brandon was watching this as everything that James was saying and thinking appeared on the screen as a text bubble. "Oh crap, maybe he dropped it here before he went in." Brandon says as he begins looking for the coin in this room.

As James continued looking he heard the sound of footsteps coming up to him across the sand he turned around to find himself face to face with a trio of Gerudos. 'Oh cool, I actually get to see them.' he thinks to himself as he can't help but notice how beautiful they are, even if they are just pixils and coding.

They start speaking amongst themselves and motion for James to stand up. He does so and as soon as they do, they pin his arms around his back, tying his wrists together. "Hey what's going on here." he says in shock.

The Gerudos say nothing as they carry him off to their fortress, intending on using him for slave labor. They don't even notice how his height drops by a few inches, making him 5'6" tall and that's where it stays.
1313322222211112.title: Gets Picked Up by Gerudos

13133222222111121.content:
James was finding it hard to move around with his arms behind his back and being carried by the Gerudos. However they made sure he didn't fall down once during the trek.

The eventually got closer to their destination which James immediately recognized as the Gerudo Fortress. 'Good, maybe there will be some food and water in there.' he thinks to himself.

He's then lead inside and taken immediately down to the prison area and thrown in a cell along with four other men who are dressed in ratty clothes and look malnourished.

"We'll be back when our leader decides your fate." one of the Gerudo says as she and her sisters walk away, closing the cell door behind them.

James grabs the bars and starts yelling at them to come back but they ignore him as they head upstairs. Sighing to himself he goes back to sit next to one of the other guys. "So how long have you been here?" he asks one of the men.

Meanwhile, Brandon is continuing to look through the house but can't seem to find it. Now he's scared stiff as he knows that without that coin, there's no hope of getting James out.

Speaking of James, his changes continued on as the game was integrating him in as one of it's characters. His already red hair turned a brighter shade and grew down to his shoulders where it was thicker than before.
13133222222111121.title: Arriving

131332222221111211.content:
As James wallowed in his cell, the three Gerudos who had brought him to the fortress were speaking with Ganon on what to do with him. "For some reason, I feel we could put him to use for us in battle." he says.

The three Gerudo looked at each other with confusion as if they couldn't understand why Ganon would want to do that. "Bring him to the training grounds and see if he is worthy of joining us." he orders.

The three nod their heads and start heading back down to the prison to bring James to the training grounds.

Speaking of James, he was sitting on the floor, wondering when he would be able to get out of there and go look for the coin so he could get out of this world. He was able to remember the general location of where it was that he ended up, but the first step was getting out of this cell.

As he sat there, his shoes turned red as the toes pointed upwards. Along the instep of the shoes, a strap appears over them with three silver studs on top of them.

Before too long, he hears the sound of footsteps coming down into the dungeon and the three Gerudos who had picked him up earlier opened the cell and pointed at him to come with them.

He got up and left the cell and they made sure to close and lock it behind them so the other prisoners wouldn't leave. "So what do you want with me now?" he asks.
131332222221111211.title: Meeting With Ganon

1313322222211112111.content:
The three Gerudo look at each other before they turn their attention back to James. "You have been selected by Lord Ganon himself to undergo training and if you are successful, you will be fighting alongside us." one of them says.

The one in the middle nods her head. "But if you fail, then you will only be used for slave labor." she says to him.

As much as James doesn't want to be a fighter here, he knows that it's his only chance of being able to get back out into the desert and look for the coin. "You have a deal." James says.

The third Gerudo just laughs at that statement. "You don't really have a choice in the matter. Anyway come with us." she says and the three of them lead him out of the prison area.

Once outside, James sees that there are four horses parked outside. The three Gerudos each hop on one. "The other one is for you. Consider the ride there to be part of the test." one of them says as the three of them gallop off.

Sighing to himself as he had never ridden a horse before, he knows that he is going to fail these tests miserably. However as he gets on, he suddenly realizes that he knows what he's doing as he snaps the reins, making the horse start galloping.

As he rides along, his hair continues to get longer and brighter, now reaching his shoulders and is even more luxurious than before.
1313322222211112111.title: They Answer

13133222222111121111.content:
Surprisingly, James finds that he's able to easily reach the training grounds, drawing upon his memory of playing the game before he had sold it off to make some quick money.

Upon parking the horse and tying it up, he starts making his way over towards the other three who had been waiting for him. 'Wow, this place is just like it was in the game.' he thinks to himself as he finally reaches them.

When he gets there, he begins looking around at the various things they have there. "So what's first?" he asks as his voice gets a little bit higher.

One of the Gerudo's walks over towards a rack and picks up a bow and a quiver of arrows. "The first thing you're going to do is target practice." she says and then directs him over towards the shooting range.

Having never fired a bow in his life, James knows he's screwed as he steps up to the line, pulling out an arrow and loading it in the bow. Taking aim the best he can, he pulls back and lets the arrow fly.

And to his surprise, as well as that of the three Gerudos, his arrow his the target right on the bullseye. "Wow, I didn't know I could do that." he says as his jeans start getting softer as a pinkish tint starts appearing on there.

The Gerudo's scoff at this. "Beginner's luck. Bet you can't do that again." one of them says. Feeling confident, James loads up an arrow and takes aim once again.
13133222222111121111.title: Arriving

131332222221111211111.content:
Once James has the aim that he wants, he lets the arrow fly and watches with even more surprise as this one hits the bullseye as well.

And if he was suprised, then the three Gerudo were in complete shock as very few have managed to perform that feat of hitting two bullseyes in a row. They start speaking amongst themselves as James' confidence has gone through the roof.

When they're done talking with each other, they turn their attention back to James. "Let's see if you can do it for a third time." the suggest.

Nodding his head, James loads the bow once again, taking aim and firing. And once it connects, the jaws of the three Gerudo hit the floor as it nails the bullseye one more time. 'This kid is the real deal.' one of them thinks to herself.

James is all smiles now, even as his legs start to reshape themselves, becoming toned and sexy in his thighs while his calves slimmed out giving him a pair of sexy legs that the three women he was with would be envious of.

"So what now?" he asks.

The three of them then converse with each other once again before coming up with yet another idea. "Ok so you're good at firing arrows and hitting targets. Well how about..." she says.
131332222221111211111.title: Repeat Performance

1313322222211112111111.content:
"...You try it on horseback. All of the best of our warriors can hit their target dead on while riding a horse no problem." Liza, one of the Gerudos says.

James can feel his heart leaping up into his chest as he knows that there's no way he could fire an arrow while being on something that's moving.

But deep inside of himself, he felt an almost arrogant confidence starting to build up. Making it as if he wasn't willing to turn down any challenge thrown his way, rather face it head on and excel at it.

Grabbing the bow and arrows, he makes his way back over to the horse that he rode in on, and climbs up on top of it and slides the quiver over his shoulder. "So what do you say we get this started?" he asks.

Before the Gerudo's can get the course set up, his pants continue to become softer and more pink as it's now the more dominant color although it still has a ways to go.

This is confusing Brandon quite a bit as he doesn't know why his pants would be doing that. "Maybe that sun is powerful enough to bleach some materials." he reasons to himself.

And then finally the course is ready to go and the three Gerudos, Liza, Aveil, and Moira, stand aside. "Start whenever you're ready." Moira says.
1313322222211112111111.title: Doing it On Horseback

13133222222111121111111.content:
James gives a nod of his head and cracks the reins of the horse, causing it to whiny before taking off down the path along the range.

Making sure to keep his legs tight around the horses back, he pulls out the bow and starts loading an arrow and fires it off towards the target just as he passes by.

All three of the Gerudo watch carefull as the arrow soars through the air before landing directly at the bullseye of the target which causes them all the more surprise. "There's....just no way. It's impossible." Aveil says.

Her companions are just in utter disbelief at what happened, meanwhile, James is just brimming with confidence which is borderlining being just plain arrogant. 'As if that result would be in any doubt.' he thinks to himself.

"So do you ladies need another demonstration or was that enough?" he asks as he has the horse trot over towards them.

Before they give their response, James' skin begins taking on a tan that's getting deeper by the second, it's not finished all the way but it has a nice glow about it as if he spent most of his time out in the sun.

This was something that didn't go unnoticed by Brandon who was already a bit taken off guard by James' earlier pants change. "And now it's causing him to tan pretty quickly. Makes me glad I didn't go in." he mutters to himself.

What do the three Gerudo ultimatly decide to to do?
13133222222111121111111.title: New Challenge

131332222221111211111112.content:
Not knowing what else to do as every obstacle they threw at James, he cleared easily and effortlessly so they decided that continuing on further would be time wasted.

"You're going to come with us to meet the boss." Liza says.

James' eyes go wide upon hearing this. 'Boss? Does that mean they want me to see Ganon? This could be bad.' he thinks to himself.

And as Brandon reads the text on the screen which is showing the conversation, as well as James' thoughts, he begins to get worried as well. "Very bad indeed James, you gotta find a way to get yourself away from them." he says with worry.

Another thing that worries Brandon is that as James is getting on his horse, his shirt seems to start retracting, climbing higher up his stomach while the sleeves are retracting. 'Just what is happening in there to him?' he thinks to himself.

It had been quite a bit of time since James had entered the game, and Karen was beginning to get worried about her big brother since it had been awhile since she had seen him. Entering his room, she instead finds Brandon with his eyes glued to the TV. "Hey Brandon, have you seen James?" she asks.

Brandon is startled by her entrance and her question. He continually glances back and forth from the game and TV, wondering just how he's going to respond to that.

He finds out though, that he doesn't have to as Karen had stepped inside the room to glance at the screen to see just where James is.
131332222221111211111112.title: Report to Ganon

1313322222211112111111122.content:
As Karen glances at the TV screen, she sees an image of James riding horseback alongside the three Gerudos and her eyes go wide with shock and fear. "Brandon, how did James get in the game?" she asks.

Brandon sighs as he pats the seat next to him. "You might want to sit down, it's a bit of a long story." he says.

Karen nods her head and takes a seat next to Brandon who explains how him and James found the coin, figuring out what it could do, buying the Zelda game, and then finishing with what happened to James and how he's in the game.

"That's quite a lot to swallow at once, but considering what I'm seeing, I know it has to be true." Karen says solemnly.

They both turned their attention back to the TV as James and the Gerudo trio had returned to the fortress while the three girls led James inside.

And they both witnessed yet another change to James as his age jumped up to nineteen although since it wasn't really that visible of a change, it pretty much went undetected by the two of them.

It's not long after that though when they lead James to the outside of Ganon's chambers. "Wait right here while we report the results of what happened on the training grounds." Liza says as she and her comrades go inside to speak with Ganon.
1313322222211112111111122.title: She Questions Brandon

13133222222111121111111221.content:
Once inside Ganon's chambers, he glanced over to see Aveil, Liza, and Moira approaching him. "There you are, how did things go with the outsider?" he asks.

The three of them glance at each other, wondering just how to put the events that just transpired into words. It was at that point Aveil stepped up. "My lord, the boy managed to prove himself more than capable of fighting for us. He managed to hit four bullseyes in a row, one of them on horseback." she says.

Ganon strokes his chin as this seems to really get the gears turning in his head. "Very good, send him in." he orders.

Aveil nods her head and goes to open the door and poke her head out. "You may come in Joomes." she says.

James has a confused look on his face as he heard what she referred to him as but just shakes his head as he steps into Ganon's chambers. He looked in awe as he saw the King of Thieves sitting on his throne, looking as regal as royalty can be.

"So I heard you scored high marks on the training grounds, even higher than some of my best Gerudo." he says.

James gulps and nods his head. Ganon then rises from his throne and makes his way over to Joomes, neither man breaking eye contact with the other as Ganon eventually reaches James and puts a hand on his shoulder.
13133222222111121111111221.title: Meeting the King of Thieves

131332222221111211111112211.content:
Joomes is no doubt nervous about what's going to happen to him as Ganon stares straight into his eyes and smiles an almost wicked smile. "Welcome to the clan Joomes." he says before patting him on the back.

Joomes eyes go wide and he pinches himself to make sure that he's not dreaming. "You mean you're not going to kill me or send me back to prison?" he asks.

Ganon gives a hearty laugh at the suggestion. "And waste all of that natural talent that you have? I wouldn't dream of it. My boy you're going to be doing great things for the Gerudo clan." he says.

And at that point, Ganon feels a rumbling in his stomach. "And the first great thing you're going to be doing is joining Aveil, Liza, and Moira for the morning hunt." he says.

Joomes cocks his head in confusion as his hair finishes changing to a deep fox red color as it now reaches his butt. "What's that?" he asks.

Moira steps up to answer this question. "Every day, a group of us is chosen to go hunt for food to feed the clan for the day." she explains.

Joomes nods his head as a smile appears on his face. "That sounds good, might be a good opportunity for me to really prove myself to the rest of the clan." he says although his true intentions are to try and find the coin so he could go back home.

And with that, the four of them leave Ganon's chambers and then heading to the armory to grab the weapons needed to do the hunt.
131332222221111211111112211.title: Welcome to the Clan

1313322222211112111111122111.content:
Once the four of them reach the armory they each grab a bow and a quiver of arrows. With their equipment, they then head outside and get on their horses, riding out to the desert.

As they ride, Joomes pays no attention to where there could be some food to hunt. Instead, he's looking for the coin, scanning the desert to see if he can catch any glint of shine in the sand but unfortunatly he sees no such thing.

One thing that he doesn't notice though is that thanks to his rexposure to the desert sun, his skin finishes darkening into that golden tan that matches that of his three companions perfectly.

Even though he doesn't notice it, Brandon and Karen sure do and their eyes go wide when they see this. "Why does he have the same skin color as those women?" Karen asks.

Brandon tries to stammer out the words but they don't seem to come to mind. "Maybe his skin is adjusting to the heat?" he asks to see if Karen will buy it.

The group travels further along and eventually, they come across a pack of desert wolves traveling amongst the sand. "There's some food, let's get it." Liza says as her, Aveil, and Moira draw their bows and arrows.

Joomes does the same and when he tries to take a shot, his hair falls in his face, obscuring his vision. He fires anyway. Does his shot hit?
1313322222211112111111122111.title: The Hunt Begins

13133222222111121111111221112.content:
Unfortunatly for Joomes, his shot missed it's mark, striking a cactus instead and James fell off of the horse as he lost his balance.

When he got up, he saw that his horse had stopped, as well as the horses of Aveil, Liza, and Moira. The three of them got down and walked over towards him. "You having some trouble?" Liza asks.

Joomes gets up and brushes himself off. "Yea, my hair got in my eyes and completely clouded my vision, I couldn't see anything." he says as he looks down at the sand, completely disappointed in himself.

The three Gerudo looked at each other when Aveil started digging around in her pants before pulling out a golden hairband with a large red jewel attached to it. "Here, this should help. It's neccessary for us Gerudos to keep our hair out of our eyes when we do battle." she says.

She makes her way over to him and ties his hair up into a long ponytail which goes all the way down to his waist. "There, you should be good." she says.

Joomes reaches up to feel it and his eyes go wide as it feels like solid gold. "Wow, this feels amazing." he says in awe.

The three nod their heads and get back up on their horses. "So Joomes, are you ready to continue or need more time to rest?
13133222222111121111111221112.title: No

131332222221111211111112211121.content:
Joomes clears his head and thinks about his next action. "Actually, I think I'm ready to go." he says as he puts his quiver back on, recollects his bow, and hops up on the horse.

Brandon and Karen continued to watch this and she was confused by what she just saw. "Why is James' hair like those ladies'" Karen asks.

Brandon knows exactly what's happening as it appears that James is turning into a Gerudo but doesn't want to alarm Karen. "So that when he hunts, he won't fall off the horse again." he explains, hoping that will be enough for Karen.

And luckily for him, it is as she nods her head and goes back to watching her brother hunt for food in the Gerudo desert.

Since the previous pack of wolves had been scared off from that assault, they combed the desert for another one and soon they found another pack of them, grazing over in a cactus patch. "Let's get em." Liza says.

They start charging over on their horses and Joomes starts loading his bow and aiming, finding it much easier to do this now with his hair out of his face and starts opening fire on the wolves.

The first shot causes them to scatter and Joomes manages to pick off three more before they get away. "Looks like we'll be fed for the whole day." he says with a smirk.
131332222221111211111112211121.title: Continue

1313322222211112111111122111211.content:
The rest of the wolf pack managed to barely escape, leaving their fallen brethren behind for Joomes, Aveil, Liza, and Moira to pick up.

The four of them dismounted their horses and pulled out the sacks they carried with them to load the carcasses inside of them. Joomes was finding that he was having a hard time lifting them up. "Wow, these are heavier than I thought." he says to himself.

Little did he know it was because what muscle mass he had worked to attain had dwindled away, leaving behind smooth feminine appendages.

This causes the three Gerudo to giggle amongst themselves. "That's why we help each other out with that." Moira says as she goes to help Joomes life the sach and attach it to the harness on the horse.

The four of them work together to get the carcasses loaded on their horses and start heading back to the fortress. Along the way, Joomes keeps looking for the coin in the sand as they travel but is still unable to find it.

As Brandon and Karen watched, Karen was confused as she knows that her brother is strong enough to have lifted that wolf up on his own. "Why was it that James needed their help?" she asks.

Brandon struggles to find an answer. "It's because that wolf was actually really heavy." he says. 'I wonder just how long I can keep this up without letting her know what's really going on.' he thinks to himself.
1313322222211112111111122111211.title: Collecting Meat

13133222222111121111111221112111.content:
The four of them continue their trek back to the fortress. Along the way, Aveil, Liza, and Moira start talking about some past memories which Joomes stays out of the conversation as he can't really have anything to contribute.

Strangely enough though, some memories begin popping into his head as he starts to think that he had been stuck with the Gerudos for months. "Yea I remember that, when you dropped that wolf off the back of the horse and didn't realize it till we were back at the fortress?" Joomes recalls which earns him a laugh from everyone.

Finally though, the manage to get back to the fortress, taking the horses around back to where the kitchen entrance is. Joomes hops down from his horse, a little disappointed that another day had gone by without him finding the coin.

'Just how long am I going to be stuck here before finally finding it?' he thinks to himself.

As he and the others begin unloading the carcasses, his pants have turned completely pink and started poofing out. The poofing effect continued to increase until they almost looked like the kind of pants you'd see on a genie or another.

This is not lost on Karen who is starting to make the connection of her brother's altering apperance starting to look similar to that of the Gerudos. "Why do his pants look like that now?" she asks.

And Brandon immediately has an answer for that. "Because they allow more airflow to get to his legs since it's really hot there." he explains and she nods her head. 'I have no idea how much longer I can keep this up.' he thinks to himself.
13133222222111121111111221112111.title: Back to the Fortress

131332222221121.content:
"I want to try this one since it's the furthest ahead." James says as he pulls up the file that has the game saved at the Hyrule Castle. When he loads the game he sees that it's actually at the end of the game, after that Link had defeated Ganondorf.

As James is going through the items that this person had on Link, Brandon is holding the coin as an idea flashes through his mind. "Hey I got a fun idea. How about we wish ourselves into a spot in the game and get to see it first hand." he suggests.

James eyes go wide with excitement as he seems to like this idea. "Very good idea Brandon, let's try it out." he says.

Brandon nods his head. "Do you want to go first?" he asks to which James nods his head. Upon that, Brandon hands him the coin. "Have fun." he tells him.

As James is trying to decide what point of the game he wants to teleport himself to, he sees Princess Zelda walk by on the screen which gives him an idea. "I got it, I'll go to Hyrule Castle. I've always wanted to see Princess Zelda live." he says.

Brandon chuckles at James comment. "Well buddy, this is your opportunity so go ahead and do it." he says.

Grinning to himself, James clutches the coin in his hands and makes his wish. "I wish that I was in the game at Hyrule Castle." he says when suddenly a bright flash erupts which sends him into the game itself at the location.
131332222221121.title: Yes

1313322222211211.content:
"Hey young man, what do you think you're doing loitering on the castle grounds?" James hears being yelled at him as his eyes slowly begin to flutter open.

"Huh?" he asks as he looks up to see someone dressed up like a knight and lightly poking him with a spear.

The knight just sighs and steps back. "Have you had a little too much to drink? I'll ask you again, what are you doing on the castle grounds?" he asks once again.

James gets up off the ground and brushes himself off and looks around. "Where am I?" he asks as he continues to look around as this place does look very oddly familiar to him.

"You are on the royal grounds of Hyrule Castle young man and I'm afraid I'm going to have to take you to see the king." the knight says as James' changes begin, his ears beginning to get pointier to start things off.

This does seem to get James excited to the point where he doesn't even realize he's holding the coin and accidentally drops it on the ground. He follows the guard to the into the main castle chambers.

Back on the outside, Brandon witnessed the whole thing and saw the coin fall from James' hands. "Ugh, James, you better get out there and grab that coin otherwise you're gonna end up stuck in there." he mutters to himself.
1313322222211211.title: Waking Up

13133222222112111.content:
Brandon continues to watch this with fascination when he hears the sound of a knock on James' door. "Who is it?" he calls out.

The door opens and James' younger sister Karen pokes her head through the door. "Heya Brandon, where did James go?' she asks as Brandon tries his best to stammer an answer.

Speaking of James, he was being led through the castle corridors by the knight who had found him and James was wasting no time in taking in his new surroundings. 'This place is amazing.' he thinks to himself.

As he continues to be lead down the hallway, his changes continue onwards. This time it's focused on his clothing as his shoes begin altering, getting to be a pale color as the material hardens and toes become pointy.

At last he finally sees the throne room and the king of Hyrule sitting upon the main throne. "What do you need Gerard?" he asks, gesturing to the knight.

Back in the real world, Karen was still waiting for an answer from Brandon and stepped inside of James' room. "Well?" she asks and then turns around to glance at the screen.
13133222222112111.title: Meeting the King

131332222221121111.content:
When Karen turns around to look at the screen, she has a horrified look on her face. "Oh my, what happened to James? How did he end up in the TV?" she asks as she sits down next to Brandon to watch.

Brandon sighs as he gets ready to explain just how it happened. "Me and James found this coin that granted whatever wishes we had and James wished to be able to experience the game itself so he got sent in it. And he still has the coin." he explains.

Karen nods her head upon hearing this. "That makes sense, but that doesn't explain why James is changing." she says as she points at the TV screen.

Brandon immediately shifts his attention towards the TV screen and he groans. 'Crap, I was hoping she wouldn't notice that, forgot how smart she was.' he thinks to himself.

Both Brandon and Karen watch as James' pants drop down past his feet, completely covering them. But before they were completely covered by the pants, they were able to see James' shoes shift completely to a pink color.

"Why is James changing like this? I mean this is completely wrong." she says as she glances over at Brandon, hoping he'll have some sort of answer for this.

Does Brandon have a way of explaining it?
131332222221121111.title: Karen's Reaction

1313322222211211111.content:
In all honesty, not even Brandon knows just how to explain why his friend and Karen's brother is changing right before their eyes. 'It really is weird that he's doing that, is he making wishes with the coin?' he wonders.

That's when Karen notices a similarity between James and the person he's walking with. "Hey, they both have pointy ears." she points out.

Brandon looks closer at James' ears and watches as the finish growing out into a sharp elfin point. The signature trait of a Hylian. "I think I might've figured it out. Somehow the game must be making it for him to fit in." he explains.

Karen nods her head. "So is there anything we can do?" she asks to which Brandon just shakes his head. "Nope, only hope that he's smart enough to use the coin to get himself out of there." he says as they both watch his meeting with the king.

Gerard clears his throat. "Excuse me sire, but I found this young man on your castle grounds and was inquiring on what you would like done with him?" he asks.

The king strokes his beard as he glances over James. 'Something odd about this boy. Normally I'd just have my knights throw trespassers out, but for some reason, I don't want to do that.' he thinks to himself.

"Sire?" Gerard asks again.

The king's eyes are squarely on James as he starts to feel nervous. "Young man, I don't know who you are or where you came from, but I have this odd feeling that you must stay here." he says which shockes both James and Gerard.
1313322222211211111.title: Yes

13133222222112111111.content:
Gerard is stunned by the response that his king had given. "Sire, I think this is highly unorthodox. You don't know if this lad could be someone who's out to terrorize or overthrow your kingdom. I beg you to reconsider." he says.

Inside, James feels much more relieved, but also worried as well. 'This could go either very well, or very badly depending on how I play my cards.' he thinks to himself.

At this point, the king stood up. "I'm sorry you feel that way Gerard, but that's my ruling and that's final." he states with an stern affirmativeness.

"Yes...yes sire." Gerard replies. Brandon and Karen continue to watch this unfold as well as the changes to James' clothing. The sleeves of his shirt seemed to seperate right at the bicep of his arm. The lower part of it began to slowly crawl down his arm, reaching just past his elbow for now as it was a lighter color and made of a softer material.

With that decided, Gerard led James to another part of the castle. 'And I can't believe that I'm actually going to lead him to the empty chambers by the king's room as that's the only available room there is.' he thinks to himself, a little bit jealous that James is getting better treatment than he is.

"This looks like it could get interesting." Brandon says to which Karen nods her head, feeling worry for her brother.
13133222222112111111.title: Reactions

131332222221121111111.content:
As James is led up to his new room he smiles to himself as he can't believe he's getting the royal treatment. A thought that rings true on so many levels that he's not even aware of yet. However, once him and Gerard reach the room, Gerard turns to face him.

"I don't know what it is that you have over our king but I absolutly will not allow you to enter a vicinity this close to him without asking you to empty everything out of your pockets." he orders.

James finds this to be a reasonable request and begins to empty his pockets when the coin falls out and hits the ground with a loud 'clink' noise which draws Gerard's attention. "Hmm...what's this?" he asks as he reaches down to pick it up.

James feels his heart sink as Gerard grabs it. "Excuse me but..." he starts to say before Gerard cuts him off. James then feels his hips beginning to push outwards, starting their growth although they're only 32" wide for now.

"Quiet, let me inspect this." he says as he looks it over. He gets a rather ominous feeling about it. "I don't know about this coin but it makes me nervous. I wish it went back to where it came." he says.

James eyes go wide and Brandon and Karen almost scream as they just saw the coin disappear right before them. "Oh this is not good." Brandon says.
131332222221121111111.title: New Room

1313322222211211111111.content:
Gerard is stunned when he sees the coin disappear in his hand. "Oh my, I'm glad that thing's gone now. Who knows what it could've done." he says as he then opens the door to let James into his new room.

James was very scared about the coin being gone now because as far as he knew, that thing was his only way back home. 'Now how am I going to get back?' he thinks to himself.

Karen turns around to face Brandon with a worried look on her face. "That was the wishing coin he just wished away wasn't it?" she asks as Brandon solemnly nods his head. "So what does that mean? Does that mean he's stuck?" she asks.

Brandon nods his head once again. "Yea, which means that there's no way of getting him out." he says with a sigh. "How are we going to explain this to your parents?" he asks to which Karen starts sobbing. "What's wrong Karen?" he asks.

Unbeknownst to either of them, thanks to the wording of Gerard's wish, the coin had come back to them and Karen was unaware of how she had placed her hand on top of it. "Oh James, I wish there was some way I could be there with you." she says.

Just then there's a bright flash and Karen is gone, leaving Brandon all alone in James' bedroom. "Karen! Karen where did you go?" he shouts as he looks around the room. "This is not good, how could this have happened?" he asks aloud.

That's when Brandon notices something on the bed where Karen's hand had been.
1313322222211211111111.title: Coin Reappears

13133222222112111111112.content:
"That looks really weird." Brandon says to himself as he looks at the imprint at where Karen's hand was. It looked like it was normal except for the fact that it went a bit deeper in the middle as there was a circular print in there that looked like a coin.

Brandon's eyes go wide when he sees this. "Does that mean when that Gerard guy wished the coin went back to where it came, it came back here and now Karen has it?" he asks himself.

He immediately turns his attention back to the screen where he sees Karen has materialized at the castle. She looks around and her own eyes go wide with surprise. "This is the same castle that James is in. But how did I get here?" she asks herself.

That's when she notices something in her hand and she opens it up to see a coin resting on her palm. "Wait a minute...isn't that the wishing coin? That means I can use it to get me and James out of here." she says with excitement. "But first I have to find him." she says as she begins looking.

From Brandon's viewpoint, the screen is split in two with one half showing James and the other half showing Karen. "Karen, just wish for the two of you to get out of there." he says in frustration. That's when he notices something on James' half of the screen.

James' pants were changing further, as the color was shifting from their blue denim to a softer, light pink color. It wasn't complete yet but it was far enough along for Brandon to know that it was pretty far off from masculine. The material even looked softer and silkier.

Karen continued running through the castle, hoping to find James while also making sure she didn't get caught.
13133222222112111111112.title: An Imprint of the Coin

131332222221121111111121.content:
Karen quietly tiptoed through the castle, carefully peeking around every corner to make sure that no one was on the other side before she turned it and walked down the next corridor. 'This place is huge, I'm never going to find him at this rate.' she thinks to herself.

That's when she remembers the coin in her hand. 'Oh yea that's right.' she thinks to herself. "I wish that I knew where James' location is and how to get there." she says.

Suddenly her mind is flooded with the knowledge of just where James is inside the castle as well as the quickest route to get there. "There we go. Hang on James, I'll find you and get us both out of here." she says as she starts making her way towards him.

Brandon smiles and nods his head as he watches this. "There we go, I knew you were smarter than that." he says with a hint of pride in his voice.

He continued watching Karen confidently move about the castle, taking every route that came into her head as it brought her closer to James, and that's when he noticed something strange about her. "Oh not her too." he mutters.

He sat there shocked as he saw her own ears begin to gain a point, getting longer and stretching out until she too had the same elfish, Hylian ears that James possesed. But his worries didn't last all that long. "As long as she has the coin, everything will be ok." he says to himself.

At this point, he wonders if he should keep watching her, or focus his attention on James.
131332222221121111111121.title: Karen's Search

1313322222211211111111212.content:
Since he now knew that everything was going to be fine, Brandon decided to switch his attention over to James and see how he was holding up. And he was a little confused by what he saw as it appeared that the room he was in seemed a little...feminine.

"The king wants me to stay in here?" James asks as he looks around.
