Gerard nods his head. "Yes, apparently there's no one else who wants to stay in here." he says as they both look over the room.

"I can see why." James quietly mutters under his breath. He hears footsteps coming around and look over to see Karen enter the room. "Karen what are you doing here?" he asks as his hair gets even longer, reaching his chin where it's now a strawberry blonde.

She then holds up the coin. "I found the coin James now we can both get out of here." she says excitedly.

Gerard immediately recognizes the coin in her hand. "I knew that thing was trouble, give it hear so I can destroy it." he demands as he starts approaching her with his hand outstretched.

Karen starts to get scared as she doesn't know what to do. "Oh great now what." she says.
1313322222211211111111212.title: Switch to James

13133222222112111111112121.content:
Karen begins to panic as she doesn't know what to do and says the first thing that comes to her mind. "I wish that Brandon was here, he'd know what to do." she says as her eyes go wide, realizing the complications of what she just said.

Back in the real world, Brandon just stares in shock. "Karen!" he shouts before finding himself engulfed in a blinding white light.

When Brandon finally comes to, he finds himself in the same room as Karen, James, and Gerard. And upon his entrance, Gerard turns his attention to him. "Who are you, where did you come from?" he asks.

Brandon completely ignores the questions from Gerard and turns his attention to Karen. "Karen, wish us out of here now." he demands.

If he would've had his mind focused on other things, he would've noticed how James' waist finished growing at 36" wide. And Karen's own changes continued as she got older, bringing her to sixteen years old.

Gerard was geting closer to Karen and was about ready to pounce on her. And in all of the confusion, does Karen make the wish to get them out of there or does Gerard reach her first?
13133222222112111111112121.title: She Makes a Wish

131332222221121111111121211.content:
Not knowing what to do or what to say and lacking really any experience in self-control, Karen once again said the first thing that came to her mind. "I wish this coin was somewhere where you couldn't get it." she says.

With that wish, the coin vanishes from her hand and transports itself to another location that Gerard would never find it. When he looks down to see that it's gone, he smiles to himself. "Well it looks like you did my job for me young lady. Now I will be taking you in." he says as he prepares to arrest her.

However, James steps forward. "Stop it Gerard, I shall not allow you to do that." he commands with an authoritative tone in his voice which stuns both Brandon and Karen. 'Whoa, when did he learn to do that?' Brandon thinks to himself.

His eyes are squarely on James as he watches his head take on a more roundish appearance, the angles fading away and it looked like that facial hair he had been trying to grow was completely gone now, replaced by smooth silky skin.

Gerard is about to tell James off, telling him that he has no authority to give him orders when he finds himself faltering and stepping back. "I'm sorry about that sir, I'll leave you three alone for now." he says as he leaves the room.

Brandon's eyes switch over to Karen as he sees her hair starting to get longer and reach past her shoulders. "Ok I want to know why you did that Karen, now we're all stuck here." he says to her.
131332222221121111111121211.title: Wish Time

1313322222211211111111212111.content:
At this point James steps in to try and diffuse the situation. "Everyone please calm down, especially you Brandon. We're not going to get anywhere arguing." he says as he places his hands on his hips.

Brandon hangs his head low at being scolded like he was a child by his best friend when he notices something odd about James' arm. He watched as that band that was on there earlier crawled all the way up to his hand, completely covering his fingers as it formed a light pink satin glove.

And upon further glance, Brandon saw that a similar glove was on James' other hand. "Oh and I forgot to mention that both of you are changing to fit in here better." he says to them.

Both James and Karen look at Brandon with a confused expression on their faces. "Look in the mirror and you'll see what I mean." he says.

Both of them turn to look at their reflections and see the changes. "Oh my goodness what's happening to us?" they both ask in unison.

Brandon sighs as he gets their attention once again. "Look, our only chance is to find that coin and wish ourselves out of here before your changes go too far. It can't have gone far. We should split up and look seperately." he suggests.

What do Karen and James think about this?
1313322222211211111111212111.title: Making a Plan

13133222222112111111112121111.content:
As much as they think it might be a bad idea to split the group up, they decide that maybe it would be better if they all searched for it on their own. "So how are we going to split up, where is everyone going to go?" Karen asks.

And to their surprise, it's James who speaks up first. "How about I take on some of the more restricted areas of the castle. For some reason, I seem to be allowed in those places." he says as his voice rises higher up in pitch.

Brandon nods his head in agreement. "Ok I guess I'll take the fields then. How about you Karen?" he asks as he turns towards her.

And it's at that point he sees her grow in height, all the way up to 5'4" tall as her age also jumped to eighteen. "I guess I could cover the rest of the castle." she says.

All three of them nod their heads. "Ok, well with that settled, I'm headed off." Brandon says as he takes off from the room, not wanting to stay in this world a second longer.

While he was gone, Karen and James looked at each others' eyes as fear began to overwhelm them. Neither of them knew what to say although one of them had to speak first.
13133222222112111111112121111.title: They Like It

131332222221121111111121211111.content:
The silence goes on for a few more seconds before Karen decides to say something first. "James, I'm really scared, I don't know what to do. From what Brandon said it appears we're changing to fit better in this world." she says.

James then pulls her in for a tight hug. "Don't worry about it little sister, we're going to find away out of here." he says. He then starts to feel a bit of pressure building up in his backside. "Ow, what's that about?" he asks in frustration.

He reaches back with a gloved hand to feel his butt which had begun to get larger in his hands. "Do you have any idea what I might be becoming?" he asks her to which she just shakes her head.

"If I got a better look at you, I might be able to figure it out." she says as she starts looking him over from every angle, scrutinizing every little bit of him. "If I didn't know better, I'd say you were becoming a girl." she says as her own voice gains some maturity to it.

James' eyes go wide with surprise. "A girl? Why would I be turning into a girl?" he asks.

Karen shrugs her shoulders. "The only thing I can think of would be that whatever powers that be are in control decided you would fit better in this world as girl. So we should probably quit dilly dallying and get looking." she says.

James nods his head at this. "Good idea." he says and with that the two of them leave the room to begin their search.
131332222221121111111121211111.title: Karen

1313322222211211111111212111112.content:
Meanwhile, back with Brandon, he had was thoroughly searching through the fields, leaving no stone unturned to try and find the coin. "It's gotta be around here somewhere. The wish was just in a place where Gerard couldn't find it." he mutters to himself.

As he searches, his clothes start to feel heavier on him. "Wow, why is this stuff weighing me down?" he asks aloud.

If he wouldn't have been so caught up in his search for the coin, he would've realized his clothes were hardening, starting to become made of metal but he wasn't about to let that stop him. "Where could that thing be?" he asks himself.

Meanwhile, Karen and James had finally split up and began their search. Their own changes were continuing onwards.

With James, he was shocked when he felt that his movements were a bit more constricted and looked down to see that his pants had merged together, forming a silk skirt that completely covered his feet and was a light pink color to match his gloves.

Karen, on the other hand, had her clothes meld together to form one whole garment which was completely light in color. "I wonder just what I'm turning into for this place." she says to herself as she enters the castle library.
1313322222211211111111212111112.title: With Brandon

choices: Switch to One of the Others
13133222222112111111112121111121.content:
James went off on his own, deciding to search the royal treasury as since that's a place that he somehow knew that Gerard wouldn't be allowed into, it would make perfect sense for it to be up there.

As he heads off in that direction, he starts to hear a click--clacking noise with each step he takes, stopping, he lifts his skirt up to see what's causing it and his eyes go wide upon seeing it. "Oh no." he mutters.

His shoes had finished altering into a pair of hard leather, light pink heeled pumps with a 3" heel to them. The toes were pointy and his shoelaces, as well as the tongue of them had vanished. 'Just what am I turning into?' he thinks to himself.

Wasting no time, he continues his journey to the royal treasury and he finds that it's guarded. 'Oh great, just how am I going to get in here?' he thinks to himself.

However, the guard that was stationed out there just smiled and nodded his head before opening the door. "Needing to check up on your riches Jameda?" he asks.

James just gives the guard a quizzical look but then shakes his head. "Oh uh...yea I was. Thank you." he replies as he enters he treasure room and the guard closes the door behind him.

Now that he's inside, James quickly begins going to work on trying to find the coin and see if it's there but with all of the other gold coins in here, it's going to be a bit of a mess.

'Wait a minute? Did that guy call me Jameda?" He asks himself aloud.
13133222222112111111112121111121.title: With James

131332222221121111111121211111211.content:
Jameda continues searching through the piles of treasure and coins, glancing at all of them one by one as it quickly begins to get boring for him. "I'm never going to find it if it's buried under all of this stuff." he mutters to himself.

Deciding that he's not going to have much luck looking through some of the piles of coins, he instead heads over towards some of the jewelry chests as it might have been hidden in there someplace.

As he looks through it, he feels his butt plumping up even further, filling with the toned womanly flesh and gaining the perfect bubble shape that any man would love to get his hands on. Although it's shape was modestly hidden by his skirt.

He just sighs to himself as he feels the growth in his backside as well as the fact that the only thing in the jewelery chests is a bunch of jewelry. "I wonder how Brandon and Karen are holding up." he says to himself.

Just then he hears the door open which startles him a bit. Standing in the doorway was an older man, and Jameda recognized him as he was standing next to the king when he first met him. "Oh I'm sorry to have startled you. The king has asked that you, Lady Karen, and Sir Brandon head over to the Zora's Domain immediately." he says.

Jameda has no idea what to make of this but he nods his head. "Sure sounds good." he replies.

With that, the man nods his head. "Thank you, I will go round up the others. Please meet in the throne room." he says.
131332222221121111111121211111211.title: Continue Looking

1313322222211211111111212111112111.content:
With that decided, the man, who's name is Harmond, goes on to look for Lady Karen and Sir Brandon as he had refered to them as. 'I think I heard someone say they saw Lady Karen inside the library and since that's closer, I'll start there." he says to himself.

And it's actually pretty close as he only has to go down one floor as it was right by the staircase. He spots her searching through the bookshelves. Smiling to himself, he makes his way over to her. "Lady Karen may I speak with you a minute?" he asks.

His sudden entrance caused Karen to jump and accidentally knock over an entire shelf of books. "I'm so sorry for startling you my lady, I actually need you to come with Prince Jameda and Sir Brandon." he says.

'Who's Jameda?' she thinks to herself. Although she figured he must be referring to James when he also mentioned Brandon. "Ok, where are they going to be at?" she asks as her pantlegs connect to form a long flowing skirt.

"They will meet you in the throne room and there I will explain what is to be needed of you." he explains.

Karen nods her head and waits for Harmond to leave. "Darn it, now we're all getting called off the coin search. I really hope we find it before we all change. Well I think Brandon might be immune as I haven't seen any changes to him yet." she says to herself.

And with that, she starts making her way to the throne room, somehow already knowing how to get there.
1313322222211211111111212111112111.title: Finding the Others

13133222222112111111112121111121111.content:
As Karen and Jameda were on their way to the throne room, Harmond had made it to the garden where he had learned that was where Brandon was at when he asked some of the guards if they had seen them.

It seemed that the game was going further to incorporating the three of them into this world as now everyone was thinking that they belonged at the castle although for very different reasons for each of them.

Harmond smiled as he spotted Brandon, looking like he was digging a hole. "Excuse me, sir Brandon!' he calls out.

Brandon looks up when he hears his name being called out by an unfamiliar voice. "Sir? And how does this guy know my name?" he mutters to himself.

He looked up from the hole to see an older gentleman approaching him but before he could get a word out, Harmond spoke first. "There you are, I was wondering if you could please join Lady Karen and Prince Jameda in the throne room?" he asks.

When Brandon hears the new titles of his friend and sister, his eyes go wide. 'Just what the hell is going on now?' he thinks to himself. 'And who's Jameda?'

Before he answers, this own changes continue as his blonde hair gets darker, turning completely chestnut and reaching his shoulders in a straight silken waterfall. "Sure I'll go." he says, wanting to see how his friends are doing more than anything else.
13133222222112111111112121111121111.title: Finding Brandon

131332222221121111111121211111211111.content:
Jameda was the first one to arrive at the throne room which made sense since he was the first one summoned there plus he was the closest to it. "I wonder just what this so-called 'mission' is. It better not take away too much time from our search." he says to himself as his voice shifts completely into that of a woman's.

Karen arrives next and Jameda's eyes go wide when he sees the changes that she had undergone since they last saw each other. "Oh my...Karen." he stammers.

Her clothes had shifted completely into a long sleeved, white flowing gown that looked absolutly radiant on her. "Yea...I know, this is getting really out of hand." she says with a sigh.

Brandon, on the other hand, took a bit longer to arrive since he didn't know the castle that well and his clothes were still getting heavier on him. And it certainly didn't help when his shoes had completely morphed into a pair of chain mail boots. "Am I becoming some sort of knight?" he asks aloud.

Finally, after asking several of the guards, Brandon finally reached the throne room and walked up to join Karen and Jameda. "Well it looks like you two have been having as much fun as I have been." he says to them. "Any luck on the coin?" he asks.

Both of them shake their heads when they all hear the sound of footsteps entering the throne room as Harmond and the King both enter. "I'm sure you're wondering why you were all asked to come here." he says.
131332222221121111111121211111211111.title: Meeting Up

1313322222211211111111212111112111111.content:
Brandon is the first one to reply to this. "You bet we are. Just what is going on here? How does everyone know who we are when we've only been here for an hour at the most." he says as both the King and Harmond look confused at his words.

"What are you talking about Sir Grabdon? You've been serving my kingdom and my family for years?" the king replies as Grabdon's age jumps up to twenty one.

Grabdon groans at this. 'Great now my name is changing too.' he thinks to himself. And with his mind focused on the changes, he glances over at Jameda and Karen to see how they're doing.

Karen's hair is now a gorgeous honey blonde color which flows over her shoulders in long luxurious waves. It's also braided into a very tight ponytail.

And when Grabdon glances over at James, his shock is even worse as he sees that James' waist is now a petite 24" wide although reduced to 22" thanks to the corset that he's wearing underneath his top.

"So are you ready for your mission?" the king asks to which all three of them nod their heads, wanting to get this over with. "You are to head down to the Zora Kingdom as there have been a bit of strained relations between us and I want you to help smooth them over." he says.

All three of them nod their heads and then leave the throne room. 'This shouldn't be too hard and we should be able to get back quick enough to find the coin. But maybe it could be there as well.' he thinks to himself.
1313322222211211111111212111112111111.title: The Mission

13133222222112111111112121111121111111.content:
The three of them got ready to leave the castle and when they reached the gates, they realized something. "Won't we need some supplies? Like maybe weapons in case we run into trouble along the way there?" Grabdon suggests.

As if on cue, a sharp-tipped spear appears in his gripped hand. "Oh great, I just had to open my mouth." he says as he tries to clear his throat as his voice went up an octave.

"You ok?" Jameda asks as he pats Grabdon on the back with a gloved hand. The hand inside that glove is much smaller than before with longer fingers and long manicured fingernails.

Grabdon nods his head. "Yea, felt like something was caught in my throat." he replies as the three of them then start crossing the bridge into Hyrule Field. As they cross the cobblestone bridge, there's an additional sound of click-clacking as Karen's heels had grown on her shoes.

And even though she had never worn heels before, Karen was easily able to walk in them, at least comfortably as she had yet to acquire that very feminine sway.

With that, the three of them crossed the field, passing by the Ranch as they were getting closer and closer to Lake Hylia which is where the Zora's Domain is located by. But is it an easy trip for the changing trio?
13133222222112111111112121111121111111.title: Leaving

131332222221121111111121211111211111112.content:
Unfortunatly it was starting to get pretty late in the evening which of course meant that there would be undead rising out from the ground anytime now to terrorize them. They found a small patch of trees to set up camp for the evening.

For some reason, Grabdon was feeling rather brave and made the following proclomation to his friends. "If you two want to sleep through the night, that would be fine with me. I'll stay up and take on any Stalfos that may appear." he says.

The two of them nod in agreement but just before Jameda lays his head down for sleep, he gives Grabdon a worried look. "Please be careful." he says.

Grabdon nods his head. "I will Prince Zameda." he replies and turns his attention out of the woods. 'Wait a minute...did I just call him Zameda?' he thinks to himself as he glances back at Zameda.

And his eyes widen when he sees how the sleeves of Zameda's top turn into some sort of golden light mail plates which then connect to each other with some other piece that goes across his chest. Some intricate designs then appear on them.

That's when he turns his attention back over to Karen although the name Karen in his mind didn't sound right. Like it's supposed to be Karenine. 'That's not right is it?' he thinks to himself.

He doesn't have time to worry about that though as he hears a nearby rustling.
131332222221121111111121211111211111112.title: No

1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.content:
Just as he had feared, it was an assault by two of the Stalfos monsters who were known to pop up when night fell on Hyrule field. "Just great, this is really what I was hoping for." he says to himself sarcastically.

He then glances at the spear in his hand. "I don't even know how to use one of these things, but it's better than nothing." he mutters as he then returns his attention to the encroaching invaders.

"Take this!." he shouts as he charges at them with the spear. Expecting to get his own head taken off by them, he instead finds himself ducking one of their arms and then beheading it with the spear as the rest of it's body falls to dust.

Feeling more confident in his skills after that demonstration, he then brings the spear up and charges at the other one, leaping into the air and beheading it as well and lands behind it. "Wow, I'm actually really good." he says to himself.

As he was fighting, he didn't notice how the rest of his clothes had become a complete set of chainmail armor which gave his body ample protection against anyone wanting to do any physical assualt to him.

"Looks like we might be safe afterall." he says to himself with a grin, now feeling completely confident in his ability to fight and protect his friends.
1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.title: Stalfos Ambush

1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.content:
Luckily for Grabdon, or rather lucky for any Stalfos, there wasn't any more attacks during the evening as Grabdon continued to stand watch, ready to repel anyone or anything who sought to harm any of his friends.

When dawn finally broke, he knew it would be safe to travel through the fields again without having to worry about another Stalfos attack.

And not wanting to be rude he decided to wait for them to wake up on their own, rather than waking them up himself. But that didn't stop him from continually keeping an eye on them, watching out for anymore changes that were occurring.

More maturity appeared on Karenine's face as she aged her last little bit, making her seventeen years old, the same age that Zameda now was. And he noticed that her face seemed a lot smoother, as if it hadn't seen any wear or stress.

That's when he sent his attention over to Zameda and saw that his own face was looking much more feminine by the second, his skin smoothing out and what's even more startling is that it looks like his lips are beginning to get poutier and then taking on a cupid's bow shape.

Grabdon's hair continued to grow from it's new length, all the way down to the middle of his back where it still didn't get the same kind of shine that Zameda's or Karenine's did as he wasn't that concerned with taking all that much care of of it.
1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.title: In the Morning

1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.content:
It's not long after that when Grabdon hears his friends beginning to rouse themselves from their slumber behind him. He turned around to see them getting up and rubbing their eyes to get their vision focused. "That was such a nice sleep." Karenine says as her voice shifts completely to that of a older teenager's.

Zameda nods his head. "Yea, I haven't slept that well in a long time. Although I'm sure it's because I was comfortable and safe knowing that Grabdiella was watching over us." he says.

'Grabdiella?' Grabdiella thinks to himself as he shakes his head. 'That's not my name is it?'

But he doesn't have time to dwell on that as he watches Zameda change further, his hair now completely blonde and reaching down to the middle of his back in a silken waterfall. 'Wow, that's really pretty but I'm not one for something like that.' he thinks to himself.

After witnessing these latest changes to his friends, he knows that they have to push on to find the coin hopefully as per the wish that was made earlier of where to send the coin, it could very well have ended up in Zora's Domain.

"Ok, let's go." Grabdiella says as he finds that he can move pretty well despite having heavy armor on him. His body was becoming much more slimmer and delicate as well as more petite.
1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.title: They Wake Up

1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.content:
There weren't any obstacles or monsters in the way of the group so it made their trip to Lake Hylia that much easier. As they reached the Lake, Karenine decided to point out something. "You know Grabdiella, you really should do something nice with your hair, it's rather unbecoming having it look so worn." she says.

Grabdiella huffs at this. "I like my hair just fine as it is. Just because I don't care for it to look as nice and shiny as yours doesn't mean it's a bad thing." he snaps back.

Just then he shakes his head wondering why he even got upset about someone commenting on his hair. "We really need to find that coin." he says.

They finally reach Lake Hylia and look out into the water. "I guess this means we're going to have to swim." Grabdiella says as he starts approaching the water. Just before diving in, Zameda stops him.

"You mean that you want to go in there and get your clothes wet?" he asks in a softer tone, his voice changing completely of that to a female's and a rather familiar princess.

Grabdiella looks at his friend with a confused expression on his face. "What's gotten into you? Why would you care if your clothes got wet or not? We have to go down there and of course we're going to get a little wet since it's the Zora Domain." he replies.

He starts to approach the waters again, but do Zameda and/or Karenine join him?
1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.title: Arriving at Lake Hylia

choices: Karenine and Zameda Think They Were Always There
1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.content:
Just as Grabdiella is about to leap into the water, both Karenine and Zameda stop him. "What are you doing, we have to go through here to get to the Zora Domain." he says.

Before Zameda and Karenine answer him, new information floods into their head, letting them know that the path they are taking is the wrong way. "And just how do you propose going through all that water. There's no way we can make it through and hold our breath long enough." Zameda says.

Karenine laughs at Grabdiella. "Yea, I don't know what you were thinking with that idea. You really do fit in with a lot of the guys you hang out with." she says.

This causes Grabdiella to glare at Karenine. "Just because you prefer to live a more posh and 'luxurious lifestyle doesn't mean that I have to follow that example." he retorts.

The two of them are glaring at each other until Zameda gets inbetween the two. "That's enough. We can't be fighting like this. Look, Grabdiella, we have to take Zora River to reach there instead." she says.

And Grabdiella sighs at this. "And just how do you propose we get there? It'll be night again by the time we get there." he points out.

Suddenly a trio of riding horses appear next to them and Grabdiella's eyes go wide in shock. "Where did those things come from?" he asks in shock.
1313322222211211111111212111112111111121.title: No

choices: invite Karen to come with you to the mall.
They watch as Karen comes toward them.
132.content: On the way they see Karen walking home from music lessons. Brandon finds himself wishing that Karen looked like a lady in one of those girlie magazines they had up in their hideout. Brandon and his buddy rub their eyes. They can not believe what they are seeing. Karen is this beautiful woman dressed in hot pants. They are not sure what to do. They like Karen and do not know how to explain this to her parents. What a dilemma!
132.title: On the Way

133.content:
The two of them drive along, chatting with each other about all the possbilities they can play out with the coin when suddenly something catches Brandon's eye. "Hey let's make a quick stop here." he says.

James doesn't know what it was that Brandon saw that made him so excited all of a sudden. "What is it man?" he asks as he looks around trying to see what it could be.

Brandon however just points out the window towards what it is, causing James to creen his neck over to get a look.
133.title: Making a Stop

1333.content: Where are they right now?
1333.title: Something Else

13332.content:
James turned his head and saw what was the local water park. It wasn's full right now but then again it wasn't empty either. James turned his head back to Brandon.

"Why there?" he asks his friend. "This may be even more fun than the mall could have been" said Brandon. James was a little unsure. He had his mind set on the mall and this came out of left field.

"Well, if you say so" said James, giving Brandon what he wanted. Brandon smiled and sat back down again, happy he got his way this time.
13332.title: water park

133321.content:
They parked and walked outside. They looked to see just a group of girls playing at the water park.

"Here, we should get some swim trunks on." Brandon said with the coin in his hand. "I wish we were wearing swimsuits"
133321.title: parking the car

1333212.content:
The coin glowed for a second and they looked down to see they were both two piece bikini's.

"Oh crap, I wish we were wearing swimsuits that were made for out bodies."
1333212.title: A Hasty Wish

13332122.content: The two friends slowly start to shrink, both dropping to 5'6". Also their mind slowly started to change as well, starting with them not minding the 2 peices. Next...
13332122.title: Not What They Wanted

133321221.content: As James and Brandon walked to the ticket booth, they both felt a tickle on there back, there hair had grown out. They were about to react to it when more mental chages made them see it as normal.
133321221.title: Their hair changes

13333.content: So, if they're not at those places, when where are they?
13333.title: somewhere else

choices: Brandon Wields the Coin in His Hand and Has an Evil Grin
Make All the Girls Want Them
133332.content:
They both stare at one lovely young woman who was sunbathing with her top off, and her breasts were large enough that when she was laying on her stomach her nipples slipped to the sides.

"Oh man, you know what we should do? I say we make a wish" Brandon suggested.

"But about what?"
133332.title: the beach

134.content: and it is Brandon's mother calling
134.title: Cell Phone Rings

135.content: What happens as the two boys head towards the mall?
135.title: Something Else

14.content:
"What you think? We've got a coin that grants wishes" James says.

"Want to mess with someone? Like your family?" Brandon grins. Whilke he thinks it would be funny to test it on his family, he'll let James work it first.

James laughs at the thought, and he quickly runs to his house, Brandon close behind. "How should be my first target?"

Brandon grins, and suggests...
14.title: Mess With Their Families

144.content:
Brandon Grinned at all the possibilities he had to choose from, and grinned even wider given that James had given him the choice as to their 'victim.'

"Let's see..." Said Brandon, scanning the household of the Walker family, processing in his mind the perfect candidate for their plans and schemes.

He observed his older brother, Kevin Walker, whom was 18 years of age, and who possessed the same red hair owned by his mother and younger brother James, but had the brown eyes of his father. At this particular moment. Kevin was with his girlfriend in the living room, Elizabeth 'Liz' Davis, an 18 year old as well, though both you and James believed her to be much too attractive to be with a suitor such as Kevin. They, Brandon and James thought themselves more suitable candidates for her. Ms. Davis was a brunette haired girl, approximately 5'5" and had dark emerald green eyes. The girl was on the bubbly and popular side of the school's social ladder. Though, despite her stance on the social food chain, you thought her a great person. She was kind, smart and, only for the purpose of making this description shorter, the polar opposite of those on the higher end of the social food-chain.

Next, Brandon looked to James' younger brother, Nate Walker, 10 years of age, brown haired like his father, but blue-eyed like his mother. Nate was still at the innocent height of 4'9" He has the attitude that is but too prevalent in the children of today's society. He thought he was on top of the world, he thought himself a genius and what not. Despite this poor attitude, the kid was likeable when he wanted to be. Although, Brandon and James only saw Nate for a fleeting second, only because he quickly rushed from the living room to his own room, to play with his video games.

Following, Brandon noted the only one of James' siblings that Brandon felt he really knew. This character was none other than Ms. Karen Walker. The sweetest girl you'd ever meet. She was 12 years of age, had brown hair that only went the slightest bit below her shoulders, and blue-eyed like her brothers and mother. And 4'11" in height, only slightly overshadowing her younger brother, Nate. The girl liked track, animals, a staple of girls' likes, and taiquando, not so much a staple of today's pre-teen girl. She was a sweet girl, but knew how to fend for herself, if such is necessary. It can also be said that she has the best relationship with James out of all the other residents in the house. James and Karen hung out very often, their relation ship was all but in dire straits. In fact, if ever you called ti hang out with James', there would be occasions where he'd turn you down because he was hanging out with Karen. This you respected. And, hey, the kid was likeable. At this moment, Karen sat in the living room, on the couch opposite to where Kevin and Liz sat, simply reading one of her books.

Subsequently, Brandon observed James' Father, Raymond Walker, a 44-year-old nicotine user and workaholic, a truly bad culmination. Raymond was brown haired and had the brown eyes to match. Raymond stood at a towering height of 6'3" The man always wore his working clothes, the pants that always seemed a bit too formal for wherever the Walkers went, the tie and buttoned down shirt that was also too formal and up-tight for wherever they may have been. The perfectly shined work-shoes. And, the ugliest part of his whole appearance were his habits, that habit that killed it all being his smoking. He always had a lighter and pack of cigarettes handy, much to the dismay of his wife and children. The relationship between Raymond and his family, wife included, was strained. At this moment, he was in a heated business related phone call. Surely, he'd be an acceptable candidate for the coin.

Finally, and rounding off the Walker home, was Bridgette Walker, the mother of Kevin, Nate, James and Karen, second mother, practically, to Brandon Thomas. Bridgette was 39 years of age, had red hair that went only slightly past her shoulders, and blue eyes. Bridgette stood at 5'11" only slightly surpassing her son, James. Speaking, of James and his mother, Bridgette, the two were practically spitting images of each other. Same hair color, eye color, skin color, almost the same height. Their personalities were both in sync as well, Bridgette loving to be adventurous, much like James. Bridgette had the strongest relationship with all of her children, but, again, the relationship between herself and Raymond was a train wreck. They hardly spoke. This is bad. You, along with all the other Walker children, were positive their marriage would end in divorce, but, despite everyone's knowledge of the divorce that was only a matter of time, no one spoke a word. At this moment, Bridgette sat in the kitchen, idly drinking coffee. All of her children were preoccupied with their own affairs, her husband being the jerk he'd always been.

"Hey, James." Brandon whispered to James.

"You made up your mind yet?" James impatiently challenged.

"Let's go with..."

(Given the brand new descriptions of all of the Walker family and friends, who's your choice?)
144.title: James' Mother

1443.content: So, one of his siblings, eh?
1443.title: Other...

14433.content: So, we're going with the eldest of the Walker children? Shall we include his lover, Elizabeth Davis?
14433.title: Kevin

info.brief_description: A duo finds a small artifact that can change everything they know.
info.description:
Another interactive from me. You pretty much know the drill if you've read my other interactives. Please update! Thanks to Grungepunk for his much appreciated cooperation.

This interactive involves transformations of most sorts. Things like TG, Age Progression or regression, and stuff like that. TF might be ok to an extent. Changing into Anime or Video game characters is ok too.

Another thing added is that one option will allow for alternate stories! These can have totally different characters, though the concept of the wishing coin will remain the same.

Here are the rules:

1. Keep it PG-13!
2. You can have sex, but not descriptive and try not to have too much.
3. Keep language PG-13 and also keep it tame (like not cursing every sentence)
4. Keep the story going and no killing the characters.
5. At least try to make sure your grammer is correct.


Here's the story:

James and Brandon are two friends who, one day, are having some fun in the nearby woods. In there, they come across a mysterious coin with powers over reality itself. With it in hand, their lives will change.

Characters:

1. James Walker: 16 years old, 5'9, 140 lbs, short red hair, blue eyes, likes books and video games as well as sports. Nice personality. This character is mostly based on myself, Sentinel.

2. Brandon Thomas: 16 years old, 5'6, 145 lbs, dark blonde hair, green eyes, Loner, loves video games and computers, a bit of a slacker, kind of geeky. This character is mostly based on Grungepunk.

3. Karen Walker: 12 years old, 4'11, 92 lbs, brown hair that goes a little past shoulders, blue eyes, James' little sister, has a good relationship with him, likes animals, taiquando, and track.

Characters may be added as it goes along.
